story:
Welcome to Dark Fable Miniatures Legend of Cleopatra Indiegogo campaign!

We have put together an exciting new selection of 12 sets of miniatures from the court of Cleopatra VII, the most famous of all the queens of ancient Egypt.  Cleopatra has long been the subject of fascination and is portrayed in countless films, plays, books and works of art.   Her name alone evokes the archetypal image of a beautiful and exotic queen surrounded by servants, slaves, courtiers and every extravagance that the mind can conjure.  The real Cleopatra is just as intriguing, perhaps even more so.  Her family was descended from Ptolemy, a Macedonian general who had served Alexander the Great and seized Egypt 300 years earlier.  Aside from her legendary beauty Cleopatra was an astute politician and extremely cultured and intelligent, she was fluent in seven languages and the first of her dynasty that could actually speak Egyptian.  Cleopatra was also brave, resourceful and unflinchingly ruthless when necessary.  Her rise to control Egypt was after a bloody dynastic struggle against her own brother and sister, who both met untimely ends . . . We felt that it was long overdue that such a legendary queen be added to our range of miniatures.

The Legend of Cleopatra is Dark Fable miniature's 6th Indiegogo campaign - the concept and design of the miniatures are drawn from a number of sources, archaeology, history, Hollywood films and fantasy fiction.  Our Cleopatra miniature is based on the glamorous Egyptian costumes worn by Elizabeth Taylor in the 1964 Hollywood film, Cleopatra.  John Winter did a magnificent job on this model which captures the regal bearing and charismatic personality of the legendary queen.  We are also producing five sets of Ptolemaic Egyptian soldiers (2 sets of unarmoured, 2 sets of armoured and 1 command set) which are based on archaeological evidence and tomb paintings.  The Ptolemaic army of Cleopatra's time during the late 1st century BC was heavily influenced by the Romans and David Soderquist is doing a fantastic job of sculpting their equipment and attire accurately.  We have also included some beasts and monsters to liven up your collection.  A set of hungry lions and a pair of fearsome sphinxes from Egyptian mythology which have been expertly sculpted by Andy Pieper.  Brother Vinni has produced a lovely set of Egyptian and Nubian ladies of court which will make excellent additions to Cleopatra's entourage.  Finally, we have a set of miniatures which is a hold over from our previous Temple of Set campaign.  A trio of sinister cultist guards made by the master of wickedness himself, Kev Adams!

We have some fantastic and reasonably priced perks on offer as well as some great EARLY BIRD specials for those who pledge right away.  To make this project even more tempting we have a number of cool stretch goal rewards which if unlocked, will make your perks even more of a bargain.  I have also made the entire Dark Fable Egyptian range, which was produced in previous Indiegogos, available as add-ons.  Our biggest selling point is the quality of the miniatures themselves sculpted by some of the best talents in the industry, David Soderquist, John Winter, Kev Adams, Andy Pieper and Brother Vinni.  These high-quality 28mm miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and have an incredible amount of detail and personality. Whether you are a collector or gamer you are certain to enjoy these figures!  Please check out the gallery for more images!

 

There are a variety of perks to suit every budget, which range in price from $15 to $330.  Each perk allows you to choose from the 12 sets of the Cleopatra miniatures on offer and any of the $11 add-on sets which were released during our previous Indiegogo campaigns.  The miniatures are unpainted and most come with plastic slotta bases.

  • What scale are these miniatures and what are they made of?

Most of our miniatures are 28-30mm tall, measuring from the base of the foot to the eye.  Because we use a number of different sculptors there may be a degree of variation between sets of figures.  The miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and are expertly spin cast by Griffin Moulds here in England.

  • How much is postage?

Postage will be added to your perk during checkout and is based on your location.  Please contact me regarding rates.

  • When can I expect to get my miniatures?

I am hoping to be able to start mailing out orders by July 2017.  The first two master moulds have already been made as well as several production moulds which should allow me to get the miniatures cast relatively quickly.  If there are any delays I will be sure to let you all know exactly what is going on and how long it might take.

  • How do I let you know which packs I have chosen for my perk?

You can either send me a message through the Indiegogo site or an email with your selections.  You can do this right away if you know which sets you want, or you can wait until the end of the campaign and also select from any stretch goals which have been unlocked.

  • I want to increase my perk level, how do I do this?

Indiegogo does not have an application which enables you to do this yourself.  If you wish to increase your perk level make an additional contribution for the amount which is the difference between the two perks.  For example if you contributed $150 for the level 6 perk and decided you wanted to get the level 7 perk which is $172 you would contribute an additional $22.  You will then need to send me a message about your perk upgrade.

If you have any questions about any aspect of the campaign please send me a message and I will do my best to answer you.

 

1. Cleopatra and maid servants

2. Court Personalities V: Prince of Egypt, Priestess of Isis, Nomarch (WIP)

3. Court Ladies II: Nubian princess, Lady-in-waiting, Egyptian Noblewoman

4. Mehen (The Snake Game): Eunuch guard playing learned baboon

5. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers I (Unarmoured)

6. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers II (Unarmoured)

7. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers III (Armoured)

8. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers IV (Armoured)

9. Ptolemaic Egyptian Command.  Trumpeter, Standard, Officer

10. Lions: Male, Juvenile and Lioness

11. Hieracosphinx (falcon head) and Criosphinx (rams head)

12. Temple of Set Guards II

$3000 – UNLOCKED! - Sprue of 5 Egyptian Staves is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 3 contributors and higher.  The Egyptian Staves are also available as an add-on for $4.

$4000 - UNLOCKED! - Queen of the Black Coast is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 4 contributors and higher.  The Queen of the Black Coast is also available as an add-on for $6.

IMAGE of the Seated Girl Gamer is COMING SOON!

$5000 - UNLOCKED! - Seated Girl Gamer is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 5 contributors and higher.  The Seated Girl is also available as an add-on for $6.

$6000 - UNLOCKED! - Pair of Caracals is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 6 contributors and higher.  The Caracals are also available as an add-on for $6.

IMAGE of the Lion Skin Rug COMING SOON!

$7000 - UNLOCKED! - Lion Skin Rug is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 6 contributors and higher.  The Lion Skin rug is now available as an add-on for $5.

$8000 - UNLOCKED! - Prophet of Set Variant is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 7 contributors and higher.  The Prophet Variant is now available as an add-on for $6.

$9000 - UNLOCKED! - The Palace Braziers are a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 8 contributors and higher.  The Braziers are now available as an add-on for $6.

$10,000 - UNLOCKED! - The Royal Gong is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 9 contributors.  The Royal Gong is now available as an add-on for $11.

 

SETS AVAILABLE AS ADD-ONS FROM PREVIOUS CAMPAIGNS:

Level 3 contributors and higher have the option to add-on sets of miniatures to their existing perks at $11 a set (* Unless priced otherwise).  Miniatures available for add-ons include any stretch goal reward sets that are unlocked during this campaign and all of the sets listed below.  You may also choose $11 add-on sets as perk selections if you wish.

1. Queen of Egypt, Fan-bearer and Herald

2. Court Ladies I

3. Egyptian Lady and Slave Girls

4. Egyptian Royal Guards I (Spears)

5. Egyptian Royal Guards II (Axes)

6. Egyptian Royal Guards III (Khopesh Swords)

8. Court Personalities II: Concubine with dagger, Libyan princess, Egyptian Noblewoman

9. Court Personalities III: Bodyguard, Physician, Scribe

10. Court Personalities IV: Royal Guard Officer, Nubian Scribe, Overseer

11. Serving Girls (4 Figure Set) *$12

32. Sedja Beast

50. Concubines

53. Senet Game and Players

54. Pharaoh's Champion *$6

55. Egyptianised Goblin Minion *$4

56. Lamia *$4

57. Evil Concubines I: Orc, Drow, Cyclopean

58. Stheno Consort of Set (Egyptian Gorgon)  *$8

59. Ugallu Temple Guardian Statues *$8

60. Giant Baboon Spiders

61. Amphisbaena *$15

62. Fearless Heroes

63. Prophet of Set V.1  *$6

64. Prophet of Set V.2  *$6

71. Variant Characters: Eunuch Guard, Cyclopean Eunuch, Nubian

 

Risks & Challenges

There are relatively few risks in this campaign.  Most of the miniatures have either been sculpted already or are very close to being finished off.  Two master moulds have already been made as well as a few production moulds.  Dark Fable has previously run five other Indiegogo campaigns all of which were successfully funded and fulfilled.  If there are any issues or unforeseen delays (they do happen on occasion!) I will keep you all informed of what is happening and do my best to sort them out as quickly as possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Queen Cleopatra has sent messengers far and wide to spread the word of this mighty project, but you too can help!

Ask friends, gaming associates, minions and anyone you think might be interested in these excellent miniatures from ancient Egypt to get the word out.

You can put a link to this campaign on your blog, forum or website.

Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Welcome to Dark Fable Miniatures Legend of Cleopatra Indiegogo campaign!
We have put together an exciting new selection of 12 sets of miniatures from the court of Cleopatra VII, the most famous of all the queens of ancient Egypt.  Cleopatra has long been the subject of fascination and is portrayed in countless films, plays, books and works of art.   Her name alone evokes the archetypal image of a beautiful and exotic queen surrounded by servants, slaves, courtiers and every extravagance that the mind can conjure.  The real Cleopatra is just as intriguing, perhaps even more so.  Her family was descended from Ptolemy, a Macedonian general who had served Alexander the Great and seized Egypt 300 years earlier.  Aside from her legendary beauty Cleopatra was an astute politician and extremely cultured and intelligent, she was fluent in seven languages and the first of her dynasty that could actually speak Egyptian.  Cleopatra was also brave, resourceful and unflinchingly ruthless when necessary.  Her rise to control Egypt was after a bloody dynastic struggle against her own brother and sister, who both met untimely ends . . . We felt that it was long overdue that such a legendary queen be added to our range of miniatures.

The Legend of Cleopatra is Dark Fable miniature's 6th Indiegogo campaign - the concept and design of the miniatures are drawn from a number of sources, archaeology, history, Hollywood films and fantasy fiction.  Our Cleopatra miniature is based on the glamorous Egyptian costumes worn by Elizabeth Taylor in the 1964 Hollywood film, Cleopatra.  John Winter did a magnificent job on this model which captures the regal bearing and charismatic personality of the legendary queen.  We are also producing five sets of Ptolemaic Egyptian soldiers (2 sets of unarmoured, 2 sets of armoured and 1 command set) which are based on archaeological evidence and tomb paintings.  The Ptolemaic army of Cleopatra's time during the late 1st century BC was heavily influenced by the Romans and David Soderquist is doing a fantastic job of sculpting their equipment and attire accurately.  We have also included some beasts and monsters to liven up your collection.  A set of hungry lions and a pair of fearsome sphinxes from Egyptian mythology which have been expertly sculpted by Andy Pieper.  Brother Vinni has produced a lovely set of Egyptian and Nubian ladies of court which will make excellent additions to Cleopatra's entourage.  Finally, we have a set of miniatures which is a hold over from our previous Temple of Set campaign.  A trio of sinister cultist guards made by the master of wickedness himself, Kev Adams!
We have some fantastic and reasonably priced perks on offer as well as some great EARLY BIRD specials for those who pledge right away.  To make this project even more tempting we have a number of cool stretch goal rewards which if unlocked, will make your perks even more of a bargain.  I have also made the entire Dark Fable Egyptian range, which was produced in previous Indiegogos, available as add-ons.  Our biggest selling point is the quality of the miniatures themselves sculpted by some of the best talents in the industry, David Soderquist, John Winter, Kev Adams, Andy Pieper and Brother Vinni.  These high-quality 28mm miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and have an incredible amount of detail and personality. Whether you are a collector or gamer you are certain to enjoy these figures!  Please check out the gallery for more images!
 



There are a variety of perks to suit every budget, which range in price from $15 to $330.  Each perk allows you to choose from the 12 sets of the Cleopatra miniatures on offer and any of the $11 add-on sets which were released during our previous Indiegogo campaigns.  The miniatures are unpainted and most come with plastic slotta bases.
What scale are these miniatures and what are they made of?
Most of our miniatures are 28-30mm tall, measuring from the base of the foot to the eye.  Because we use a number of different sculptors there may be a degree of variation between sets of figures.  The miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and are expertly spin cast by Griffin Moulds here in England.
How much is postage?
Postage will be added to your perk during checkout and is based on your location.  Please contact me regarding rates.
When can I expect to get my miniatures?
I am hoping to be able to start mailing out orders by July 2017.  The first two master moulds have already been made as well as several production moulds which should allow me to get the miniatures cast relatively quickly.  If there are any delays I will be sure to let you all know exactly what is going on and how long it might take.
How do I let you know which packs I have chosen for my perk?
You can either send me a message through the Indiegogo site or an email with your selections.  You can do this right away if you know which sets you want, or you can wait until the end of the campaign and also select from any stretch goals which have been unlocked.
I want to increase my perk level, how do I do this?
Indiegogo does not have an application which enables you to do this yourself.  If you wish to increase your perk level make an additional contribution for the amount which is the difference between the two perks.  For example if you contributed $150 for the level 6 perk and decided you wanted to get the level 7 perk which is $172 you would contribute an additional $22.  You will then need to send me a message about your perk upgrade.
If you have any questions about any aspect of the campaign please send me a message and I will do my best to answer you.
 



1. Cleopatra and maid servants

2. Court Personalities V: Prince of Egypt, Priestess of Isis, Nomarch (WIP)

3. Court Ladies II: Nubian princess, Lady-in-waiting, Egyptian Noblewoman

4. Mehen (The Snake Game): Eunuch guard playing learned baboon

5. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers I (Unarmoured)

6. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers II (Unarmoured)

7. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers III (Armoured)

8. Ptolemaic Egyptian Soldiers IV (Armoured)

9. Ptolemaic Egyptian Command.  Trumpeter, Standard, Officer

10. Lions: Male, Juvenile and Lioness

11. Hieracosphinx (falcon head) and Criosphinx (rams head)

12. Temple of Set Guards II


$3000 – UNLOCKED! - Sprue of 5 Egyptian Staves is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 3 contributors and higher.  The Egyptian Staves are also available as an add-on for $4.

$4000 - UNLOCKED! - Queen of the Black Coast is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 4 contributors and higher.  The Queen of the Black Coast is also available as an add-on for $6.
IMAGE of the Seated Girl Gamer is COMING SOON!
$5000 - UNLOCKED! - Seated Girl Gamer is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 5 contributors and higher.  The Seated Girl is also available as an add-on for $6.

$6000 - UNLOCKED! - Pair of Caracals is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 6 contributors and higher.  The Caracals are also available as an add-on for $6.
IMAGE of the Lion Skin Rug COMING SOON!
$7000 - UNLOCKED! - Lion Skin Rug is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 6 contributors and higher.  The Lion Skin rug is now available as an add-on for $5.
$8000 - UNLOCKED! - Prophet of Set Variant is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 7 contributors and higher.  The Prophet Variant is now available as an add-on for $6.

$9000 - UNLOCKED! - The Palace Braziers are a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 8 contributors and higher.  The Braziers are now available as an add-on for $6.

$10,000 - UNLOCKED! - The Royal Gong is a FREE stretch goal reward for Level 9 contributors.  The Royal Gong is now available as an add-on for $11.
 

SETS AVAILABLE AS ADD-ONS FROM PREVIOUS CAMPAIGNS:

story:
We are ARRLI. We would like to present a leather bag for handheld dice, designed in Minimal mixed with RPG style from the sewing skill of the experienced leather man.

The bag is made from high quality genuine cow leather from professional artisan with his willingness and dedicated attention in every detail to ensure long lasting quality, durable for carrying and provide good looking at its best.

In this project, we have already ordered and produced some, in order to aware the production capacity per day and the quality of the actual product that we will deliver to the supporters. Now, we are confident that if this project succeeds, we will be able to produce high quality products in a timely manner. At this moment, we are confident that we will deliver quality products at the specified time.

We hold the faithful, the supporters' satisfaction as the core of our work piece. We also adhere to the same policy that if we cannot deliver the product to our customers, we will refund the full amount.

And finally, if you see our products interesting. We would like you to help us spread this to your friends or acquaintances to make this project successful. So we will have the funds to run the other projects. Thank you all for your interest and support.

Risks and challenges

You will get quality products because we have a skilled, experienced and very practiced leather in this particular job. Our only risk is the delays due to the production process are all handmade. But since we have already produced some, we have eliminated the risk here. As for raw materials, we already have enough because our neighborhood is located near the largest source of leather goods in the country. You can be assured that you will receive quality products delivered directly to you. And finally, Thank you so much for your support.

story:
What happens when video game playing, comic reading, cartoon watching brothers like Alex and I (Tony) get bored? 

We invent.

In this case we were actually trying to play with our old Pokemon cards we found in an old Pokemon binder in the basement. When we struggled to understand the complexities of the game (which is why we only really collected them instead of played with them). We decided to make our own card game.

 

The scoring had to be easy, we didn't want a calculator to figure out how many health points we had left, and the attacks had to be fun. We introduced a simple coin flip to shake up the game by adding chance to the attack your character would deal. 

 

For the characters, we had loads of characters and unvierses we created on one of our "sit down with no electronics and just write/draw" days.  

 

We tested it out with our family, then with our friends, and noticed everyone was having just as much fun - especially when alliances would naturally form and break throughout the course of the game. 

 

After some beta-testing we finally got it down and created a free app that would allow you to not only track the health of up to six characters per app, but also read character bios and highlight the characters you have. 

 

We even found out that Shranks is an awesome drinking game to play with your buddies as well!

 

Now we want to release the Starter Pack to the public so everyone else can have fun with this game we created.

 

We're using IndieGoGo as the platform to allow you to pre-order the game so we can have the game manufactured and shipped to you!

 

 

A civilization long gone, a comet heading for Earth, a multiverse of heroes and villains. This is the story of Shranks.

Birth of the Multiverse

65 million years ago a comet hit the Earth. This comet was fueled with all the positive energy of the universe.

The force of the comet’s strike caused the Earth to shift at a different frequency then it normally would.

This shift in frequency caused the universe to create more universes in order to keep Earth from being destroyed. Now there are parallel Earths shifting at different frequencies in what is called the multiverse.

The Lak’ech Ala K’in Tribe

A long lost tribe found the comet and had been using it in their ceremonies.

To avoid fueling the comet with negative energy they exiled tribe members that displayed any emotions that had a negative vibration to it.

After a battle with the exiled members the whole tribe vanished without a trace.

The Destruction of the Multiverse

A second comet has been activated, this time filled with the negative energy of the multiverse and a promise of destruction instead of creation. Using the negative energy, Shranks birthed a meteor to prepare his arrival in each multiverse.

If the comet is not stopped it will destroy the multiverse.

Create Your Team and Save The Multiverse!

Whose team will save the multiverse?

All of the characters in your deck have been sent to the mysterious Quantum Superposition, a land between universes, and only one team can use the original meteor to defeat Shranks.

To obtain the original meteor you must create your team of heroes and villains from across the multiverse to battle your opponents. With the meteor you can put a stop to Shranks and save the multiverse!

 

Discover how easy it is to play Shranks! Learn the rules in a matter of 7 minutes or read the rules in these quick bullet points:

  • Each player should have between 2-6 characters in their play deck
  • Grab an item card after your turn each round until all item cards are taken
  • Play it as a trading card game or as a party game
  • 2 character cards should be on the field during a round with any other cards hidden from view of the other players
  • State out loud which one of your 2 characters will attack – also mentioning which character you will attack.
  • Flip a coin to determine what action will be used
  • You can use your items during your turn – after which the items will be dispensed
  • To see what effect your item card will have you need to flip a coin
  • You can choose to switch out either one or both of your characters during your turn
  • When one of your characters are defeated you will have to switch them with another character from your play deck – if you have any left
  • Be the last one standing to win!
  • It often isn’t as simple as it may sound once strategies and alliances are formed!

 

 
 
 

 

The Shranks Starter Pack Early Bird Special

$20 for all of the Shranks Starter Pack Contents:

1 Manual
26 Character Cards
3 Rare Cards
7 Item Cards
and 1 Coin

 

The Shranks Starter Pack

The Shranks Starter Pack with a 3% discount. The Starter Pack includes:

1 Manual
26 Character Cards
3 Rare Cards
7 Item Cards
and 1 Coin

 

The Shranks Starter Pack and 2 Booster Packs

The Shranks Starter Pack and 2 Booster Packs! You can even choose which booster packs you like from our 13 different universes!

So with the Starter Pack and 2 Booster Packs you'll be getting:

36 Character Cards
7 Rare Cards
15 Item Cards
and a Coins!

 

Create a Character or Item Card with us!

Get on a call with the Creators of the game and create a character or item card with them! 

The character or item card will officially be a part of the game packs so you never know whose hands your creations will show up in, and you never know at whose party either!

 

 

Since this game is meant to be played with friends and family - might as well get a reward for having them join the fun. You win - they win - we all win!

If you manage to get 20 of your friends and family to preorder through getting one of the perks - you get a free extra Starter Pack!

If you boss it up and get 50 people to get one of the perks - you get to create an item card with us!

And if you really are the GOAT (Greatest of All Time), and get 100 people to get one of the perks, then you can create a character card with us - normally limited to only 3 people at $1,000 - for free!

There are currently 13 different universes in the Shranks multiverse. The multiverse ranges from a superhero crime-drama, Outlawed Justice, to a wacky world where anything can happen, Beyond Average, or even a Space Comedy-Drama, Starship Panther Battles, with everything in-between!

Below is a list of the different universes and a quick idea of what they are to help you choose the booster pack you want:

 

16-Bit: In the world of 16Bit, video game testing takes on a whole new meaning as game testers are sent into the game world to make sure everything is running smoothly. In the game world,
characters are living and breathing with their own personal issues and problems.

"Scrubs" meets "ReBoot"

 

Art of Animation: Art of Animation is based in a world inside of an animation
program where the characters know they live as cartoons and they believe in a higher power that is drawing them and placing them in plots or scenarios that they have to find their way out
of. The main characters are high school students trying to find their way in life while dealing with the rival high school that’s out to destroy them in anything and everything.

"Tiny Toons" meets "Saved by the Bell"

 

Beyond Average: Beyond Average is a universe where utterly nonsensical and
crazy things are the norm. One day you could face a nameless Ninja named Nick while another day you could get sent into a strange world with talking whales because you ate a box of
cereal. Everything is possible in this wacky world.

"Powerpuff girls" meets "Deadpool"

 

C.T.F (Capture the Flag): Capture the Flag is a universe in which superhuman abilities
exist and those gifted with such superhuman abilities usually turn out to be bad people. That is why the elite, government-funded, security organization “C.T.F” or “Capture the Flag” exists. The organization is filled with highly trained, and equally as highly flawed, individuals.

"Venture Bros." meets "Knight Rider 2009"

 

In Stocks: In Stocks is about the wacky adventures of a retail store, known
as “Five Star”, and the employees and customers that frequent there. Employees range from lazy, to angry, to completely unmotivated as they are all forced to work there for varying
reasons. Some of them work there as their first job, others could only get that job, while still others just need some money while in school or while in retirement. 

"Superstore" meets "Looney Tunes"

 

Johnny Renegade: Johnny Renegade is a dark crime-infested universe made up entirely of birds. Hope is few and far between in this crime drama heavy engagement. The focus of this universe is on the police and their relationship with the dark grimy underworld of the city.

"Gotham" meets "The Departed"... but with birds

 

Outlawed Justice: In the fictional Lighthaven City, a civil war is beginning with the desperate people of the city, whom are living in the poorer East End of the city, forming a gang called the “Guardians of Light” to fight off the private police “A.C.E” or “Armed Combat Enforcement” which is owned by the wealthy people in the West End of the city. In between these two factions are the middle class. The middle class is stuck trying to find sides in a war with no true hero. Eventually, citizens rise to find the good in the city through a new form of justice: Outlawed Justice.

"The Dark Knight" meets "Full Metal Alchemist" meets "Les Miserables"

 

Public Domain: Public Domain exists in a universe in which all the fairy tale and mythological characters, that are not legally protected and are owned by the public, are real flesh and blood beings. The Public Domain is a post-apocalyptic wasteland with some areas that are toxic due to biochemical gasses. The story begins with four humans awakening in this Public Domain world after a nuclear blast. They are now trying to find a way home although they may, unknowingly, already be there.

"Once Upon a Time" meets "Mad Max"

 

Regular Time: Regular Time is about two adopted brothers in their early 20’s that have just gotten their first job with their adoptive father, an evil warlock that runs a service for criminals and murderers. These two brothers are too dimwitted to realize their father is evil or that the clients they have are just as evil, or sometimes even more so.

"Futurama" meets "Regular Show"

 

The Simpletons: The Simpletons is about two simple-minded half alchemist brothers and their street smart, but equally as simple, girlfriends.

"Bill and Ted" meets "Johnny Bravo"

 

SMPR: SMPR or Sunday Morning Prerecorded takes place in a world where Comedy Doctor is a profession. SMPR centers on college students enrolled in MMUCMS (The Meddling Media
University of Comedy Medicine and Sciences) that are studying to use comedy to heal others.

"Saturday Night Live" meets "Boy meets World"

 

Starship Panther Battles: Starship Panther Battles follows the Starship Panther, a state
of the art space exploration vehicle, and its crew: a lazy man mistaken for an army official, a robot with the consciousness of a deceased man, a spaceship mechanic, and the fiancé of a
missing space marine.

"Outlaw Star" meets "North by Northwest"

 

Tail Waggers: Tail Waggers is about a group of animals and the mischief
they get into when their owners aren’t home.

"2 Stupid Dogs" meets "The Rugrats"

 

Risks & Challenges

We currently have Shranks ready at the manufacturer so by preordering through IndieGoGo you'll also help us pay for the manufacturing of the product so we can ship it to all of you.

If we come across any issues with shipping we'll be sure to let you all know and update you. Our goal is to make sure you all get to have fun with our game as soon as possible!

When one of your characters are defeated you will have to switch them with another character from your play deck – if you have any left
Be the last one standing to win!
It often isn’t as simple as it may sound once strategies and alliances are formed!


 



 
 


 


 

The Shranks Starter Pack Early Bird Special
$20 for all of the Shranks Starter Pack Contents:
1 Manual26 Character Cards3 Rare Cards7 Item Cardsand 1 Coin
 
The Shranks Starter Pack


The Shranks Starter Pack with a 3% discount. The Starter Pack includes:
1 Manual26 Character Cards3 Rare Cards7 Item Cardsand 1 Coin
 
The Shranks Starter Pack and 2 Booster Packs

The Shranks Starter Pack and 2 Booster Packs! You can even choose which booster packs you like from our 13 different universes!
So with the Starter Pack and 2 Booster Packs you'll be getting:
36 Character Cards7 Rare Cards15 Item Cardsand a Coins!
 
Create a Character or Item Card with us!

Get on a call with the Creators of the game and create a character or item card with them! 
The character or item card will officially be a part of the game packs so you never know whose hands your creations will show up in, and you never know at whose party either!
 

 

Since this game is meant to be played with friends and family - might as well get a reward for having them join the fun. You win - they win - we all win!
If you manage to get 20 of your friends and family to preorder through getting one of the perks - you get a free extra Starter Pack!
If you boss it up and get 50 people to get one of the perks - you get to create an item card with us!
And if you really are the GOAT (Greatest of All Time), and get 100 people to get one of the perks, then you can create a character card with us - normally limited to only 3 people at $1,000 - for free!


There are currently 13 different universes in the Shranks multiverse. The multiverse ranges from a superhero crime-drama, Outlawed Justice, to a wacky world where anything can happen, Beyond Average, or even a Space Comedy-Drama, Starship Panther Battles, with everything in-between!
Below is a list of the different universes and a quick idea of what they are to help you choose the booster pack you want:
 
16-Bit: In the world of 16Bit, video game testing takes on a whole new meaning as game testers are sent into the game world to make sure everything is running smoothly. In the game world,characters are living and breathing with their own personal issues and problems.
"Scrubs" meets "ReBoot"
 
Art of Animation: Art of Animation is based in a world inside of an animationprogram where the characters know they live as cartoons and they believe in a higher power that is drawing them and placing them in plots or scenarios that they have to find their way outof. The main characters are high school students trying to find their way in life while dealing with the rival high school that’s out to destroy them in anything and everything.
"Tiny Toons" meets "Saved by the Bell"
 
Beyond Average: Beyond Average is a universe where utterly nonsensical andcrazy things are the norm. One day you could face a nameless Ninja named Nick while another day you could get sent into a strange world with talking whales because you ate a box ofcereal. Everything is possible in this wacky world.
"Powerpuff girls" meets "Deadpool"
 
C.T.F (Capture the Flag): Capture the Flag is a universe in which superhuman abilitiesexist and those gifted with such superhuman abilities usually turn out to be bad people. That is why the elite, government-funded, security organization “C.T.F” or “Capture the Flag” exists. The organization is filled with highly trained, and equally as highly flawed, individuals.
"Venture Bros." meets "Knight Rider 2009"
 
In Stocks: In Stocks is about the wacky adventures of a retail store, knownas “Five Star”, and the employees and customers that frequent there. Employees range from lazy, to angry, to completely unmotivated as they are all forced to work there for varyingreasons. Some of them work there as their first job, others could only get that job, while still others just need some money while in school or while in retirement. 
"Superstore" meets "Looney Tunes"
 
Johnny Renegade: Johnny Renegade is a dark crime-infested universe made up entirely of birds. Hope is few and far between in this crime drama heavy engagement. The focus of this universe is on the police and their relationship with the dark grimy underworld of the city.
"Gotham" meets "The Departed"... but with birds
 
Outlawed Justice: In the fictional Lighthaven City, a civil war is beginning with the desperate people of the city, whom are living in the poorer East End of the city, forming a gang called the “Guardians of Light” to fight off the private police “A.C.E” or “Armed Combat Enforcement” which is owned by the wealthy people in the West End of the city. In between these two factions are the middle class. The middle class is stuck trying to find sides in a war with no true hero. Eventually, citizens rise to find the good in the city through a new form of justice: Outlawed Justice.
"The Dark Knight" meets "Full Metal Alchemist" meets "Les Miserables"
 
Public Domain: Public Domain exists in a universe in which all the fairy tale and mythological characters, that are not legally protected and are owned by the public, are real flesh and blood beings. The Public Domain is a post-apocalyptic wasteland with some areas that are toxic due to biochemical gasses. The story begins with four humans awakening in this Public Domain world after a nuclear blast. They are now trying to find a way home although they may, unknowingly, already be there.
"Once Upon a Time" meets "Mad Max"
 
Regular Time: Regular Time is about two adopted brothers in their early 20’s that have just gotten their first job with their adoptive father, an evil warlock that runs a service for criminals and murderers. These two brothers are too dimwitted to realize their father is evil or that the clients they have are just as evil, or sometimes even more so.
"Futurama" meets "Regular Show"
 
The Simpletons: The Simpletons is about two simple-minded half alchemist brothers and their street smart, but equally as simple, girlfriends.
"Bill and Ted" meets "Johnny Bravo"
 
SMPR: SMPR or Sunday Morning Prerecorded takes place in a world where Comedy Doctor is a profession. SMPR centers on college students enrolled in MMUCMS (The Meddling MediaUniversity of Comedy Medicine and Sciences) that are studying to use comedy to heal others.
"Saturday Night Live" meets "Boy meets World"
 
Starship Panther Battles: Starship Panther Battles follows the Starship Panther, a stateof the art space exploration vehicle, and its crew: a lazy man mistaken for an army official, a robot with the consciousness of a deceased man, a spaceship mechanic, and the fiancé of amissing space marine.
"Outlaw Star" meets "North by Northwest"
 
Tail Waggers: Tail Waggers is about a group of animals and the mischiefthey get into when their owners aren’t home.
"2 Stupid Dogs" meets "The Rugrats"
 

Risks & Challenges
We currently have Shranks ready at the manufacturer so by preordering through IndieGoGo you'll also help us pay for the manufacturing of the product so we can ship it to all of you.
If we come across any issues with shipping we'll be sure to let you all know and update you. Our goal is to make sure you all get to have fun with our game as soon as possible!

story:
日本語ページはこちら！

La page en français est ici!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Take on the role of the girl and the robot as you battle the evil queen in this strategic card game inspired by concepts from Russian roulette and classic shedding card games.  

Plan strategies with your ally, deceive your opponents and play cards at key moments to avoid death by the demon.

You can find a more detailed explanation of the rules HERE!

We've put a lot of care in making this Limited Edition version just for this campaign. The game includes:

  • 56 Playing Cards
  • 4 Character Cards
  • 2 Rule Cards and 1 Turn Order Reminder Card

The limited edition also includes the Act II card that extends play time and the Lore Book that delves into the backstory of The Girl and the Robot.

Shipping is 10 CAD$ for Canada and the US, and 20 CAD$ for the rest of the world.

The final print is handled by Ad Magic, a trusted company that delivers high quality board game components.

 

So what are reviewers saying? Click on the banners to navigate to their videos or blog...

Also check those exciting playthroughs:

Rules and Playthrough by HitPointsGaming 

The Girl and The Robot - Card Game Session by Tech Geek Gamers

【手と手を取り合え！】戦略性とチームワークが鍵【The Girl and the Robot】ボードゲーム 実況 by verywellボードゲーム (Japanese)

【The Girl and the Robot】壮絶すぎる死闘！最後に笑うのは？？ by マーマン Asobi チャンネル (Japanese)

【少女とロボット】傑作アドベンチャーがボドゲとなって登場！戦略的ロシアンルーレット！by 遊ぼーど!【ボドゲ実況ch】(Japanese)

[ENG] The game is only available in English for now but we're looking into translating the game in French and Japanese once the project is successful. If you can't wait and want to support us, you can download our translation sheets here to play with the English version.

[FR] Le jeu n'est disponible qu'en anglais pour l'instant, mais nous envisageons de le traduire en français et en japonais si le projet a du succès. Si vous ne pouvez pas attendre et vous souhaitez nous encourager, vous pouvez télécharger nos feuilles de traduction pour jouer avec la version anglaise.

Feuille de traduction française

[JP] このゲームは今のところは英語版しかありませんが、プロジェクトが成功した暁には、フランス語版と日本語版の制作も検討しています。それまでは、こちらで配布している翻訳シートを利用して、英語版を遊ぶことができます。

日本語翻訳シート

Salim Larochelle is a game designer and the founder of Flying Carpets Games. He has over 11 years of experience in video game development with successful releases such as Asphalt 7 , Modern Combat 2 and The Girl and the Robot. Salim also teaches game design and is the co-founder of the Montreal Indie Games Awards. 

Ayaka Nakamura is the illustrator that came up with the unique style of The Girl and the Robot. Ayaka also won the Eizo Illustration Contest in 2018. Her art captured the hearts of over 23 000 followers on social media.

Want to help us even more? You can by simply following us and sharing this page!

story:
The Story

In 2010, I visited the Chernobyl Zone of Alienation with my wife and a couple of friends. I found the experience deeply affecting, and was surprised at how beautiful it was, in its own sad way. Our guide kept using the word paradise to describe the Zone, and despite the death and ruin, the expression is justified from many perspectives.

For the animals native to the Ukraine and Belarus, the Zone is one of the few last places where they can live without having to fear poachers or just the disruptive presence of humanity. The ruins of Pripyat and other towns abandoned after the Chernobyl disaster have their own beauty, as the concrete hulks of apartment buildings are slowly reclaimed by the forest.

Walking down a street in Pripyat in the early days of summer, I could see rays of lights shimmering through the foliage, illuminating a lone park bench, perfect for two people to sit, lost in each other amidst the ruins.

That experience was the seed for designing Chernobyl, Mon Amour. Death and love, radioactivity and something private and tender.

- Juhana Pettersson, designer: Chernobyl, Mon Amour

(A photo of the Chernobyl nuclear plant taken from a Pripyat rooftop, by Maria & Juhana Pettersson)

Your Experience

In Chernobyl, Mon Amour you play a Ukrainian criminal who flees the long arm of the law to the Chernobyl Zone of Alienation. The concept is based on a Ukrainian folk story about a criminal who fled to the Zone and became so radioactive that the authorities had to leave him there.

You know that there is no return from the Zone. Your crimes are such that society will no longer accept you, and the only thing you have left is the possibility of a new life in the radioactive forest. As you settle into the Zone and meet its inhabitants, you start to yearn for something more. You want love.

Playing out these love stories amidst a radioactive society of criminals is the core experience of Chernobyl, Mon Amour.

The Game

Chernobyl, Mon Amour is a Finnish tabletop roleplaying game built with a strong focus on character immersion and experiencing the game world through the character's subjective viewpoint.

The mechanics of Chernobyl, Mon Amour are minimal to the point of non-existent, at least if seen through the lens of traditional roleplaying game design. Instead of stats and dice, the functioning of the game is coded into the setting, Game Master and player advice, as well as the design of preparatory workshop exercises.

The game is not easy for the Game Master, as it requires the GM to handle running everything to allow the players to focus on their character-based experience.

As a point of comparison, Chernobyl, Mon Amour has a similar relationship to mechanics-based roleplaying games as Nordic Larp has to larp utilizing complex rules systems. In both cases, complexity of mechanical simulation and game design is sacrificed for a more nuanced, personal feel to the game.

(An interior illustration by Joel Sammallahti.)

The Book

The book is softcover, approximately 100 pages illustrated in full color by artwork from Joel Sammallahti and Tia Ihalainen, as well as photography by Juhana Pettersson and Maria Pettersson.

Timetable

The translation of the game already exists, so only the physical production remains. The goal is to have it delivered during early summer 2018.

The game will be delivered using DriveThruRPG, both for physical copies and PDFs.

Team

(The designer Juhana Pettersson proudly posing with the Finnish edition of the game in his mother's kitchen.)

Juhana Pettersson - Designer and writer. Juhana is a Finnish novelist, larp and tabletop roleplaying game designer. His first tabletop game Valley of Eternity (2007) has been published in Finnish, Danish and English. His larp End of the Line was nominated for the Diana Jones Award in 2017. Right now, he's working as one of the writers on Vampire: the Masquerade 5th Edition.

Jukka Särkijärvi - The most accomplished modern roleplaying game translator in Finland. Prior to translating Chernobyl, Mon Amour Jukka has worked on Astraterra and Stalker.

Tommi Kovala - A prolific and accomplished graphic designer, Tommi has left a distinct mark on the visual style of Finnish roleplaying game books through his work on the Roolipelaaja magazine, as well as games such as Tähti, Myrskyn sankarit and Valley of Eternity.

Joel Sammallahti - The cover artist for Chernobyl, Mon Amour, Joel also did a few of the interior pieces. He's an accomplished illustrator who has worked with roleplaying games and larp projects before, and also drew a regular comic for Roolipelaaja magazine.

Maria Pettersson - A journalist and larp organizer, Maria contributed a lot of the photographs that appear in the game.

Tia Ihalainen - An accomplished illustrator, the best-known international platform for Tia's work has been with the College of Wizardry larps organized by Dziobak. She contributed interior illustrations for this game.

Miska Fredman - One of the best roleplaying game designers in Finland, Miska's games include Heimot, Sotakarjut and Astraterra. He's also a prolific roleplaying game mapmaker, and contributed the maps of the Zone to this book.

Pohjoismaisen roolipelaamisen seura - A Finnish roleplaying game and larp non-profit organization serving as the publisher of the game. PRS is dedicated to developing larp and roleplaying game culture in Finland and the Nordics.

(A map of Pripyat from the Finnish edition, by Miska Fredman.)

What Do We Do With the Money?

A large portion of the funds generated by this campaign will go directly to fulfilling the pledges to you. This means the cost of producing physical books at DriveThruRPG. We'll also use funds to cover costs related to getting the book ready for publishing, including expenses like graphic design. As the campaign gets more pledges, we'll move to compensating the people who originally contributed their work on a pro bono basis.

Challenges

The roleplaying game has already been published as a Finnish edition, in 2016. The translation is ready, all visual materials are ready, and the chief remaining task is layouts and production. As such, risk is pretty low. Our team has a lot of experience publishing books, and we're all professionals working in the field.

That said, this is our first crowdfunding campaign, so while unlikely, it's possible unforeseen complications arise.

Indiegogo

Why is this campaign on Indiegogo and not Kickstarter? We're operating from Finland, and Kickstarter is not an option here for legal reasons. Because of this, we had to opt for Indiegogo.

story:
BRAINBO! Is a quick-fire game in the mold of others like Dobble and Jungle Speed that requires attention, intuition, concentration and Jedi-like mind-control. It's a game for 2-6 players from about 7 years old, takes 2 minutes to explain, 10 minutes to play but a lifetime to master! Take it on holiday, play at home, on the beach, in a bar... family and friends of all ages will love trying to master BRAINBO! 



Hi, I'm Ed, stay-at-home father-of-three-monsters, architect, drummer and graphic designer. After seeing an article about the Stroop effect (Wikipedia introduction here : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stroop_effect) and with years of design, and gameplaying under my belt, I found myself designing a new card game. After a few prototypes and some initial testing I realised that BRAINBO! had real potential and a purity and simplicity lacking in other Stroop-type games.

This project has been my focus for over a year now - after extensive testing, cutting out prototypes, design and redesign, now is the time to reach out to the world to help me bring my project to the public. For this, you can be involved by pre-purchasing the game, earning yourself a place on an exclusive list of BRAINBO! pioneers. We succeeded in raising enough money to pay for the initial English print run of BRAINBO! HOWEVER, the campaign does NOT stop there - the more we raise, the more amazing the project becomes...  I aim to one day see BRAINBO! At number one on Amazon, or front row at Toys 'R' Us. Let's do this!



Imagine you are asked identify the colour of the word 'BLUE' when it is printed in orange ink.. Well that brain-twister is the key to BRAINBO!'s game mechanic. BRAINBO! is a matching type game, whereby the card on the table must be matched by cards in players' hands, but the methods in BRAINBO! use the Stroop effect to trick the brain.

As soon as the dealer turns over the first card from the take pile, play begins! Depending on the mode, players must lay down (whenever they want – there's no 'turns' in BRAINBO!) a card that matches the visible card according to the mode (COLOUR or WORD). Sounds easy? Well, wait until that mode changes during the game...players have to rearrange the brain furniture in order to switch to the reverse method of matching. Special cards spice things up too...


 

In the box :

  • 64 colour cards (from 8 different colours)
  • 12 special cards (6 'BRAINBO!' & 6 'CARTE BLANCHE' jokers)
  • 1 mode card (WORD / COLOUR)
  • Full colour game instructions
  • Early contributor cards showing the names of first-round investors.



UPDATE! : In the rules, you will discover that there is special version of BRAINBO! included for those moments when you are only two : BRAINBO! BATTLE. In this mind-frazzling modern update of Snap, there are four different ways of 'snapping' ; mistakes are easy to make, and the speed of play means a real grey-matter workout! See the video here : https://youtu.be/S9Ili9gbLOw



Having three young children  has helped immensley in understanding gameplay and refining the design and rules of BRAINBO! Loads of testers have been essential in honing the gameplay  - thank you friends, colleagues and family!

The BRAINBO! Development Support Team : Ingrid Giraud (Marketing & Communication Manager), Prof. Jan Lepoutre phD (gameplay mechanics, statistical and theory analysis), and Christen Clark (Media Direction). 



If you are new to the concept of crowdfunding and kickstarter / IndieGogo, then the first thing to understand is that this is not a charity campaign (like me running a 10K) – you are actually purchasing the game. The only difference is that you will  receive the game from whence the campaign achieves its goal and the game can be printed. Don't worry, your money is safe if something should go wrong... to invest in our campaign you must choose one or more of the 'perks' on the right hand side of the main page here. The cost of shipping will be added before you donate, as needed.

          

Of course the main 'perk' will be receiving the game in all its boxed-up fresh-smelling glory, but there are different levels of perks which relate to different types of support that you can give the campaign. Perks include various objects, treats, special items that will not be available to the general public after the end of the campaign. As perks, we offer amongst others :

  • Personalised social media post thanking you for your commitment.
  • ''BRAINBO! INDIEGOGO INVESTOR'  T-shirt for those purchasing ten games
  • Fridge magnet / pin badge  'BRAINBO! INDIEGOGO INVESTOR' for those buying multiple games
  • A pdf document of the original Stroop Effect Study from 1935




WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?
The money raised from this campaign will go solely to the printing costs of the game. None of the team are taking any salary and other costs are borne by me and my company.  To print a run of card or board games, an economically viable minimum number of units is necessary – with BRAINBO!, 5000€ will enable that production.

5000€ is NOT where it ends ... STRETCH GOALS :
When we reach our target of €5000, we are not done! BRAINBO! So far exists in English only, and being part of a bilingual family I want to release the game in other languages, primarily French. As the campaign progresses and as we raise the total, stretch goals will open up making the printing of other language sets possible : 5000 for the first English set, 9500 for the french version, 14000 for the german version and so on!

VERY IMPORTANT : During testing we actually came across many colour-blind people who could not enjoy the game unfortunately. 5% of all the profits each year from the game will go as a donation to a colour-blind awareness charity, like : http://www.colourblindawareness.org/

RISKS & CHALLENGES :
It is only right to be open and honest about the risks involved in running a campaign like this... Well, the beauty of a "Flexible" campaign here on Indiegogo is we can guarantee everyone who contributes will get their promised Perk. The game is designed, tested, prototyped, has a manufacturer ready; all we need is the investment to make it happen!



"Superb idea of a game that kept our kids entertained during testing instead of always being glued to the TV or tablet!!!! It would be great also at the beach or pool. We could play together as well because age makes no difference to who wins!" - Clare Leigh, UK 

"We don't usually play a lot of card games but BRAINBO! blew our minds!" - Helene & family, France

"Such a great game for families and friends. Brilliant to take on camping trips, evenings out and any other travels you can think of. The design is gorgeous and nicely thought through, with lovely bright colours. It's a perfect birthday present and most important of all LOTS and LOTS of fun!!!" - Mathieu and family, Canada

"I've now played Brainbo! and it's great!", Tim, Cambridge, U.K.

"Played it at Christmas - brilliant family fun!", Gerald, London, U.K.


     

    BRAINBO TECHNICAL :

    As supplied to investors it will be beautifully presented, shrink-wrapped in a 10.5 x 10.5 x 4cm  size full colour quality box, with colour instructions,  and the pack of cellophane-wrapped BRAINBO! cards printed in Europe on 300gsm non-bush cards with non-dispersion varnish in 59 x 91mm size ('skat' size). 

    Thanks to you for checking out our page, and getting this far down the page!

    A big thank-you must go to those who have assisted throughout the process and also run their own small business. Please take a moment to go visit some of their sites:

    Redhill Design - Design agency located in the Paris region, France ; https://red-hill.com/index.php
    Tala Nicole Photography - Baby and wedding photography ; http://talanicolephotography.com
story_txt:
BRAINBO! Is a quick-fire game in the mold of others like Dobble and Jungle Speed that requires attention, intuition, concentration and Jedi-like mind-control. It's a game for 2-6 players from about 7 years old, takes 2 minutes to explain, 10 minutes to play but a lifetime to master! Take it on holiday, play at home, on the beach, in a bar... family and friends of all ages will love trying to master BRAINBO! Hi, I'm Ed, stay-at-home father-of-three-monsters, architect, drummer and graphic designer. After seeing an article about the Stroop effect (Wikipedia introduction here : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stroop_effect) and with years of design, and gameplaying under my belt, I found myself designing a new card game. After a few prototypes and some initial testing I realised that BRAINBO! had real potential and a purity and simplicity lacking in other Stroop-type games.This project has been my focus for over a year now - after extensive testing, cutting out prototypes, design and redesign, now is the time to reach out to the world to help me bring my project to the public. For this, you can be involved by pre-purchasing the game, earning yourself a place on an exclusive list of BRAINBO! pioneers. We succeeded in raising enough money to pay for the initial English print run of BRAINBO! HOWEVER, the campaign does NOT stop there - the more we raise, the more amazing the project becomes...  I aim to one day see BRAINBO! At number one on Amazon, or front row at Toys 'R' Us. Let's do this!Imagine you are asked identify the colour of the word 'BLUE' when it is printed in orange ink.. Well that brain-twister is the key to BRAINBO!'s game mechanic. BRAINBO! is a matching type game, whereby the card on the table must be matched by cards in players' hands, but the methods in BRAINBO! use the Stroop effect to trick the brain.As soon as the dealer turns over the first card from the take pile, play begins! Depending on the mode, players must lay down (whenever they want – there's no 'turns' in BRAINBO!) a card that matches the visible card according to the mode (COLOUR or WORD). Sounds easy? Well, wait until that mode changes during the game...players have to rearrange the brain furniture in order to switch to the reverse method of matching. Special cards spice things up too...
 In the box :
64 colour cards (from 8 different colours)
12 special cards (6 'BRAINBO!' & 6 'CARTE BLANCHE' jokers)
1 mode card (WORD / COLOUR)
Full colour game instructions
Early contributor cards showing the names of first-round investors.
UPDATE! : In the rules, you will discover that there is special version of BRAINBO! included for those moments when you are only two : BRAINBO! BATTLE. In this mind-frazzling modern update of Snap, there are four different ways of 'snapping' ; mistakes are easy to make, and the speed of play means a real grey-matter workout! See the video here : https://youtu.be/S9Ili9gbLOwHaving three young children  has helped immensley in understanding gameplay and refining the design and rules of BRAINBO! Loads of testers have been essential in honing the gameplay  - thank you friends, colleagues and family!The BRAINBO! Development Support Team : Ingrid Giraud (Marketing & Communication Manager), Prof. Jan Lepoutre phD (gameplay mechanics, statistical and theory analysis), and Christen Clark (Media Direction). If you are new to the concept of crowdfunding and kickstarter / IndieGogo, then the first thing to understand is that this is not a charity campaign (like me running a 10K) – you are actually purchasing the game. The only difference is that you will  receive the game from whence the campaign achieves its goal and the game can be printed. Don't worry, your money is safe if something should go wrong... to invest in our campaign you must choose one or more of the 'perks' on the right hand side of the main page here. The cost of shipping will be added before you donate, as needed.          Of course the main 'perk' will be receiving the game in all its boxed-up fresh-smelling glory, but there are different levels of perks which relate to different types of support that you can give the campaign. Perks include various objects, treats, special items that will not be available to the general public after the end of the campaign. As perks, we offer amongst others :
Personalised social media post thanking you for your commitment.
''BRAINBO! INDIEGOGO INVESTOR'  T-shirt for those purchasing ten games
Fridge magnet / pin badge  'BRAINBO! INDIEGOGO INVESTOR' for those buying multiple games
A pdf document of the original Stroop Effect Study from 1935
WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?The money raised from this campaign will go solely to the printing costs of the game. None of the team are taking any salary and other costs are borne by me and my company.  To print a run of card or board games, an economically viable minimum number of units is necessary – with BRAINBO!, 5000€ will enable that production.5000€ is NOT where it ends ... STRETCH GOALS :When we reach our target of €5000, we are not done! BRAINBO! So far exists in English only, and being part of a bilingual family I want to release the game in other languages, primarily French. As the campaign progresses and as we raise the total, stretch goals will open up making the printing of other language sets possible : 5000 for the first English set, 9500 for the french version, 14000 for the german version and so on!VERY IMPORTANT : During testing we actually came across many colour-blind people who could not enjoy the game unfortunately. 5% of all the profits each year from the game will go as a donation to a colour-blind awareness charity, like : http://www.colourblindawareness.org/RISKS & CHALLENGES :It is only right to be open and honest about the risks involved in running a campaign like this... Well, the beauty of a "Flexible" campaign here on Indiegogo is we can guarantee everyone who contributes will get their promised Perk. The game is designed, tested, prototyped, has a manufacturer ready; all we need is the investment to make it happen!"Superb idea of a game that kept our kids entertained during testing instead of always being glued to the TV or tablet!!!! It would be great also at the beach or pool. We could play together as well because age makes no difference to who wins!" - Clare Leigh, UK "We don't usually play a lot of card games but BRAINBO! blew our minds!" - Helene & family, France"Such a great game for families and friends. Brilliant to take on camping trips, evenings out and any other travels you can think of. The design is gorgeous and nicely thought through, with lovely bright colours. It's a perfect birthday present and most important of all LOTS and LOTS of fun!!!" - Mathieu and family, Canada"I've now played Brainbo! and it's great!", Tim, Cambridge, U.K."Played it at Christmas - brilliant family fun!", Gerald, London, U.K. BRAINBO TECHNICAL :As supplied to investors it will be beautifully presented, shrink-wrapped in a 10.5 x 10.5 x 4cm  size full colour quality box, with colour instructions,  and the pack of cellophane-wrapped BRAINBO! cards printed in Europe on 300gsm non-bush cards with non-dispersion varnish in 59 x 91mm size ('skat' size). Thanks to you for checking out our page, and getting this far down the page!A big thank-you must go to those who have assisted throughout the process and also run their own small business. story:
Roulette dice is a helping device, which helps you randomly decide what to bet each game on the roulette. 

The idea!

The idea came from looking at other peoples bets. Everyone wants to bet randomly, but they all end up betting on the same pattern. Humans are not capable of doing random things, which means we need some help when it comes to the term "random".

                                 

Why crowdfunding?

Actually the reason is pretty simple. I love doing some side project beside my job. On the paper, I am able to do electronics stuff.. But I love to make the whole thing by myself and not just parts of a project. But to make the whole thing, you need CNC machine faster that you would imagine. So this project will contribute some founds to buy my own CNC machine. As you noticed, my product does not have a low price. The problem is, because I have to give my 3D drawings to somebody else, who already has a CNC machine, to do it for me. And that does not come cheap :)

For all of you, who will be founding this project:

-When the campaign ends, I will start manufactoring the dices.

-The process of manufacturing them and shipping them out, will last aprox. one month. So, thank you for your patience :)

Let me introduce the "Roulette dice", what is its purpose, how it works, etc.

Roulette dice


What is a roulette dice:

Roulette dice is a helping device, which helps you randomly decide what to bet each game on the roulette.

Why:

Humans are impossible to act randomly. Even if we get a task to randomly draw dots on a piece of paper, we will fail. Because inside of our mind we draw dots based on a pattern. What if I told you, that chances for winning a lottery with numbers  1,2,3,4,5,6,7 are exactly the same as for 22, 37, 1 ,8, 11,33, 29? But the fact is, you would never write a lottery ticket with numbers chosen 1,2,3,4,5,6,7! This is because it is not normal for us, we actually do not want to act randomly, that is why we rather choose numbers like 22, 37, 1 ,8, 11,33, 29.

This is why we need help when it comes to choosing random numbers.

Where can I use it:

It doesn't matter if you play an online roulette at home behind a computer screen or if you play on a live table at the Casino.

How does it look like:

Roulette dice has 6 sides and each side is devided on 9 different  sectors. Which means that a roullete dice has 54 different fields. On each of this 54 fields there is a symbol or a number which tells you what you should bet on the next game.

                                  

How do I use it:

Let's start playing...

First you need to check which winning number was drawn on the previos game. This tells you which sector you have to look at when you roll the dice. If the last winning number is a zero or a double zero, you will have to pass next game. As you may know, zero and double zero belongs to the casino. So every time previous game hits zero or double zero we will not bet in the next game.

Playing instructions:

1.  Check previous winning number on the roulette

Check history bar on the player screen, to see which was the last winning number. You will usually have to do this just the first time after  joining a new table. For all future games you will have no problem remembering the last winning number.

                            


Remember, if the previous winning number is a zero or a double zero, you will have to pass next game in line. Because each time a zero or a double zero is drawn as a winning number we will not play next game, due to the statistics.

2.  Selecting the sector

Depending on the previous winning number, select which sector on the roulette dice you will be watching (1-9).

Sector 1, 2 and 3:

                   

Sector 4, 5 and 6:

                 

Sector 7, 8 and 9:

               

3.  Roll roulette dice

...

4.  Find your lucky number for the next game

When the dice stops, look at the top side of the dice, and look at the sector( marked with dots) you have chosen previously depending on the last winning number.

                                 


5.  Make a bet with your recently chosen lucky number

Make a bet as written on the field, that has been chosen on the roulette dice. Roulette dice has 54 different bets available.

Example:

1.  If last winning number was 29 black, as shown on the picture, this means that, when we roll the dice we will have to look at the sector marked with 6 dots (sixth sector).

Because number 29 is inside the sector 6, means that when we roll our roulette dice, we will choose a number that is in the field 6.

2.  Now we roll the roulette dice, and when it stops look at the top plane.

3.  On the top plane at the roulette dice in a sector 6 there is a symbol »Ev«, which means, we have to bet on even numbers in the next game.

EACH ROULETTE DICE COMES WITH USER MANUAL + FLYER (symbol interpretation and sector explanation).

Flyer (front + back side):


HELP OUT:

For each donaion I will be thrilled!
Even if you do not donate, and just spread a good word, I will be more than happy!
For any question, you can reach me on the e-mail: roulettedice1@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

My name is Sam Ijeh the founder of samodesigns and I'm a super-fan like many of you. I started designing board games as a fun hobby (I know weird) and before I knew it, I had a small following asking me where they could purchase my games. I'd never taken it seriously before then but it's been a dream of mine to produce board-games that everyone can enjoy. We have been blessed with a few amazing opportunities. A major one being an invited to the South by South West Gaming expo in 2017 for a closed-door presentation.  But we still have a long way to go. Many of our previous projects have been spin off titles that require copy right privilege and other road blocks to put on shelves. That's why for this project we're bringing you a brand-new game that's unique original and free of restrictions. This by far is Samodesigns biggest project yet, and though I'm happy to say production is going great so far, if we can't get the game in the hands of you all, the players, its all for not. We need your help in order to make this dream a reality. Show your support for our campaign and help us in the quest to put the power in the hands of the players.  

What We Need & What You Get

Samodesigns may be small but were no slouch! 

To complete our project were requesting $12,000

This should cover our cost of materials, manufacturing, distribution, and if there any thing left over we can our artists. Kidding... mostly... 

We've done a lot with a little in the past however with your contribution  we can deliver a level of quality that has previously been out of our reach. We're proud of our work and we want you to be proud to be a part of it!

We're happy to return the blessings in a show of appropriation  to any and all who support us along the way. Besides early access to the game, original signed concept art from our artists  and heavily discounted copy's when the game is released. We've got a few extra tricks up our sleeves... Stay tuned for details.    

If we're not able to completely reach our goal  don't expect us to throw in the towel so easily. As I stated before we have a history of being able to make a little go a long way. If we're able to reach the 75% mark on our campaign we should still be able to make things work albeit at a much slower pace. If we know there are people out there that want to play our game we will do our best to provide it and keep our supporters posted throughout the process.   

The Impact

When I 1st decided to embark on my 1st major board game design project in 2015 I naturally turned to the internet for advice and was appalled at what I saw. Give up. Go home. Stop trying. Not satisfied with that I dug deeper and found the most positive message they had to offer at the time if you want to do this aim low. It doesn't matter if its ugly just make it and get it over with. Chances are if you spend a lot of time on your project you'll either give up halfway or end up wasting a lot of time and money when you realize know one wants it.  Obviously I wasn't going to be deterred so easily Mama didn't raise no quitter, and Pops always said if your going to bother doing something do it well. So ignored what they read, did it my way, and was very glad I did.I cant say we've hit it big just yet but we have experienced some personal levels of success.

We've played our beta's at the monthly board game madness in Dallas and received very positive feed back.  

Our Pokemon Legends game generated enough noise to get us an invite to SXSW gaming expo in 2017 

Were currently running 2 campaigns with our DND book: Clash of Ninja; A Naruto Story.

and were hoping for much much more!

When I think about what would have happened if I'd heeded the web advice and never started Samodesigns, I think about how many wonderful ideas, creative projects, and crazy fun games were choked out of existences before they got a chance to blossom. I want our little operation to be a guiding light to anyone who has an idea or an inspiration but isn't sure if they can bring that dream into the real world. Don't give up! If we can do it so can you!

Risks & Challenges

A obvious risk that we face is a financial one. Without funds we will be unable to produce a game with the quality or timeless that we would like. However small operations like ours are always fighting an up hill battle we will always find a way to make the best situation out of any circumstance

Other Ways You Can Help

Any dollar amount helps but we know for some of you even a few bucks is out of reach no shame we've all been there. 

If a finacial contribution isnt possible for you right now but you want to support us pass the word on!  Let others know that your excited for the projects we're working on. The more support we have the more motivation we have to keep going.

Stay up to date on our latest development. Samodesigns will be at BGG con Nov 21-23 Come check out our booth see some of our previous projects or join us for a play test on Pokemon legends.We'll be posting updates concept art and sneak peeks as time progresses. And please be sure to leave questions if you have them. We always value the opportunity to engage with players.
