And please be sure to leave questions if you have them. We always value the opportunity to engage with players.

story:
Ever wonder what it would be like to write an adventure with Gary Gygax? Around the year 2005, Gary started working with a small number of authors on a project to write new material for his world setting (which was totally not called “World of Greyhawk”). Bill Silvey was one of those authors, and this book includes the story of working with Gary as well as the adventure Bill wrote for inclusion in Gary’s campaign world. For obvious legal reasons, none of Gary’s original material is included in Lost Crypt: this module is all Bill’s work. However, those who are interested in Gary’s world setting will be interested to read material that would have been included in it if Gary had lived to see the project through...

 

The Lost Crypt: A Classic Crawl

by Bill Silvey

A realm not terribly unlike our own exists in a strange and mostly hospitable nearby plane. While planar travel might overlook this small pocket of reality, an entrance into it exists at the deepest depths of the most storied dungeon complex in the known realms. To enter into it is to step into a world at once familiar and yet more bizarre than our own. Herein is rumored to lie artifacts of great power and treasure beyond imagination. Having explored the uttermost depths and found the entrance, a group of adventurers can thus traverse this place in search of fame and fortune!

Overview

The Lost Crypt can be used as a standalone 5e or Swords & Wizardry adventure or incorporated into a larger dungeon complex or campaign. The adventure is suited for a group of 7th- or 8th-level characters, and should include a good mix of thieves, fighting-men, and magic-users. Clerics could prove useful to cope with the number of undead. 

What to Expect

Almost lost to the pages of history!
The Lost Crypt, originally inspired by master of role playing game adventure himself was almost
lost to the annals of history. Until now! Written by veteran RPG scholar and scribe Bill Silvey,
The Lost Crypt is an old school rules style romp through an ancient tomb and hidden lairs filled
with clever monsters. Originally written for OSR rule is designed to be a challenge for veteran
characters of 7-8th level.

  • Authors notes on the inspiration behind the Lost Crypt and his legendary adventures working with Gary Gygax, co-creator of the most famous role playing game in the world!
  • Loads of traps, puzzles and adversaries to keep characters on their toes as they navigate the terrors of the Lost Crypt
  • Cover and interior art by acclaimed artist Hector Rodriguez.
  • Can be played as a stand-alone, one shot adventure or be fit into a larger campaign, or made part of a larger dungeon complex!
  • Hand cartography by Ian McGarty of the Silver Bullettes
  • An original piece of art from TSR veteran Tracy Lesch whose work is featured in
  • Dungeons & Dragons Art and Arcana: A Visual History.

 

The Tiny Print Run

Why Indiegogo?

Necromancer Games is continuing the use of this indiegogo crowdfunding method for The Lost Crypt. This method is almost the inverse of how we design our crowdfunding projects on Kickstarter. We call it the 'Tiny Print Run'.

Thus, Indiegogo projects by Necromancer Games will-

  • Be short in duration
  • Be limited to a single title
  • Have options priced between $5-$30
  • Design all stretch goals and project bonus' affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
  • Be the only guaranteed method to get the premium* print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
  • Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit

*Premium means 100 pound glossy interior pages with a thick, glossy cardstock cover. These are the nicest softcover books we have ever sold.

Why the Tiny Print Run?

Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.

This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.

Why not use Kickstarter?

We will still be using Kickstarter, frequently, for our large-scale projects. These smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.

Additionally, Necromancer Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats. 

Project Reward

With the wishes of the fans in mind, this and future Indiegogo projects will fund standalone projects that are both affordable and fun. This project, as well future Tiny Print Run projects, is narrowly focused with all stretch goals adding resources to the principle reward which traditionally would not be feasible for a publisher our size. 

Examples of Enhancements from Higher Funding:

During the 14 day primary project period for The Lost Crypt and after the $1000 goal is met the focus will be to improve the delivered product. There are no special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus, as total project funding increases the better the final product will be for everybody.

Examples of the planned extras that increased funding would bring to The Lost Crypt:

  • Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure. 
  • The previous Indiegogo project, Mystery at Ravenrock, added 2 interior art pieces and 3 extra creature illustrations for its appendix.
  • Printed Player map(s)/Insert. This is one we would love to do but it would require a substantial increase in overall project funding.
  • Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (The rewards for both How Orcus Stole Christmas! and In Vino Gigantus included the new creature/NPC tokens and player maps). 
  • High-resolution files of illustrations to share with players at the table.

 

Project Delivery

PDF Perks

We will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Necromancer Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.

The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Necromancer Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.

Softcover Perks

Softcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. 

Overseas Shipping

NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive. We understand this. Likewise, some countries charge VAT tax or other fees to our customers on receipt. We cannot fraudulently lie about the value of materials we mail out. We are happy to ship you anything regardless of where you live, but we have to stay in business at the same time thus even our lightest books are affected. In the near future we expect to have a print on demand system in place for everyone overseas, It is not ideal, as the final book is not printed at the highest-quality when compared to the ones we fulfill in Indiegogo.

To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS.

story:
Hi! We're Jenn and Adam, the creators of Not Your Ma's Jong. When our grandmothers met for the first time, they didn’t speak the same language but quickly discovered their shared love of mahjong. We had each seen them play growing up, but realized that we never play with our friends. It’s tough to learn, and games can be pretty slow.

We reimagined this ancient pastime and created a brand new card game, based on mahjong and memories of growing up with our grandmothers!

It's fast-paced, it's fierce, it's Not Your Ma's Jong!

We worked through several iterations to get the gameplay fair, fast and exciting for 3-4 players. Instead of mahjong's 144 or more tiles, we have 75 fully illustrated cards based on our Chinese and Jewish grandmothers and their friendship. We've tweaked the rules as well so anyone can steal a card they need, keeping everyone on their toes!

We currently have a perfect 5 star rating on Amazon!

We're on Indiegogo to fund our second production run!

We're almost sold out of our first production run, and your support will jumpstart the second production run of Not Your Ma's Jong with FREE shipping to you (US & Canada) - and will make our grandmas beam with pride!

Great! So what's included?

  • 75 fully illustrated cards inspired by our grandmothers and their friendship
  • 40 tokens to unapologetically take from your opponents
  • Comprehensive rules to make you the big mama of your table

Bring the fun to your family and friends!

Thank you so much for your support!

Jenn & Adam

story:
The Liborian Saga

 

 

These are hard, trying times

You can feel the tension in the air, nobody feels safe anymore. War is stirring up once again on the continent. The last couple of years have been tough on the Alliance of the Great Cities. The loss of trust and faith between folk, the rise of corruption among the Vasalli, and the Vargan incursions have all taken a toll. 

Still, life goes on in Salvora. The seat of the Alliance is to be moved to Liboria, the Jewel of the Sea, in the southeastern region of the continent. Liboria is a fascinating territory with towering mountains, wild rivers, and an unforgiving sea. It is home to illustrious characters, mighty leaders, and dangerous enemies. It’s a wild place full of mysteries, hidden locations, and treacherous roads.  

 

What is this "Awaken"?

  • Awaken is a dark fantasy tabletop role-playing game (TRPG) where you play as one of the Vasalli, a group of people who have undergone an unusual change that’s given them powers. You live in a war-ravaged world, where the Great Cities fight for supremacy and leadership over the Alliance: a loose political association holding together the territories of Salvora.

Ok, hold on! Fantasy world, people with special powers, Cities. Care to elaborate? 

  • And that's not all. There are sleeping gods, colossal guardians, underworld enemies of humankind and much more! But here is Logician Tim with his first impressions and intro to Awaken, so be sure to check it out if you want to see what Awaken is all about!

 

 

Ok, but how do you play it? 

Tabletop roleplaying games are to be enjoyed with the rulebook, a couple of dice and your friends! And this book will help you hit the floor running. 

The Awaken game system was designed from scratch and tailor-made to bring out the strengths of tableside role-playing without the burden of the complicated mechanics that most role-playing games are built upon.

  •  The game emphasizes player interaction, has an immersive feel to it, and is filled with compelling narration.
  •  Fast, fluid, and intuitive rules: We’ve designed Awaken for new and experienced RPG players alike.
  •  We only use common six-sided dice, making it easy for anyone to play Awaken. 
  •  Character creation is quick and simple: The player has full freedom in choosing and mixing their skills, attributes, and Gifts (the special powers of the Vasalli).
  •  The character development is skill-based and depends completely on how the player uses their abilities, not on how the dice land.
  •  Picture Rule: For particularly creative descriptions, the player is rewarded with bonus dice or automatic successes.  

 

 

The Liborian Saga includes: 

  • Extended Regional Lore — Players and Narrators can expect to get a ton of new information about the Great Cities of the region: Jorgun, Rinean, and Liboria, and their domains. This will include detailed maps, histories, locations of interest, and story hooks. Explore the wilderness outside of the city walls, but don’t forget to stick to the road! 
  •  More Antagonists & Monsters — A fan favorite! We’ve got you covered with expanded options for antagonists, as well as new bigger and badder creatures who can be found in certain places or all over the continent. From the heart of the mountains to the depths of the seas, the monsters are here! 
  • Regional Cults — Every city and region contains smaller cults which are usually radically opposed to the establishment. 

  •  Superior Gifts, Rituals, & Expanded Rules — Tightly connected to the regional Orders, Gifts are evolving constantly.  A flying dagger can be handy, but it isn’t nearly as good as a flying dagger on fire! 

  • Expanded Items and Weaponry — Salvora is a vast continent that’s filled with people from all walks of life, so it’s only natural that players should have access to a more varied selection of items and weapons to use throughout their adventures. 

  • “The Death Cycle” — A spree of brutal murders has struck Liboria. Numerous bodies have washed ashore, each covered in similar marks. It seems like the victims were killed in the same way. Is this the work of one serial murderer? Or are more sinister forces involved? This large adventure will take you through the three Great Cities of the region and showcase much of the information presented in the book. ​

 

 

The Liborian Saga 

A 140+ page full-color, softcover, perfectly bound handbook to explore the Liborian region. This book is packed with information about the large southeast region where gold shines brighter and shadows are darker. It also includes an epic adventure that takes place in this immersive region … the start of The Liborian Saga.

Awaken: Core Rulebook 

The original hardcover Awaken: Core Rulebook, with 220 full-color pages, is packed with all the information needed to play the game. Discover what Awaken is all about. 

Awaken Narrator Screen

A tough and durable four-panel Narrator screen, with all the important stats and tables, is perfect for hidden rolls and to use as a barricade for your Narrator’s materials.   

 

 

We will be charging for shipping through the pledge manager after the Kickstarter campaign ends based on the actual cost for shipping. We don’t know exactly how much shipping will cost—shipping rates can change quickly and vary dramatically depending on destination, shipping method, and how many rewards you’re getting. However, we hope to gain some efficiencies that will save us—and eventually you—money. 

Shipping prices are estimated as follows:

US: Free

Canada: $8 – $15

EU: $8 – $15

Rest of the world: $12 – $20 

Once again, The Games Collective stands behind the Awakengame, but this time we have reinforcements in the form of additional writers.

The Games Collective is an RPG design team founded by Marko Matijević Sekul and Zoltan Lečei. We’re avid readers, lifelong game enthusiasts, and storytelling fanatics. By founding The Games Collective, we are making a lifelong dream become reality. We love tabletop RPGs and have been creating worlds since we began discovering our own. Our goal is to share our vision with every reader, player, and explorer out there. 

Isola Illyon Edizioni is the Italian publishing house which published and translated Awaken for the Italian market in 2017. The team of Isola Illyon Edizioni loves Awaken and played it on Facebook Live and during Italian conventions with loads of Italian role-players. For the project of Awaken: The Blood of Salvora, the team of Isola Illyon Edizioni co-wrote the chapters of the book and collaborated with The Games Collective through proposals and brainstorming.

Studio 2 Publishing is the sales, warehousing, and publishing partner of many game companies, including Pinnacle Entertainment, Exile Game Studio, Crafty Games, Engine Publishing, Hunters Books, Paradigm Concepts, TerrorBull Games, Reality Blurs, Third Eye Games, Alderac Entertainment, Dwarven Forge, Calliope Games, and Kuznia Gier. Not only do they have extensive production and distribution experience, but they also have six incredibly successful Kickstarter campaigns under their belt. With all this and their passionate love for the RPG hobby, Studio 2 Publishing is the ideal partner to help us run our campaign and assist us with printing and distribution.

Risks & Challenges​

The book is funded, so there's no risk of the project failing.  The book is currently in its editing phase, so it's developing nicely. 
However, as with all creative projects, delays may occur due to artwork issues, incorporating ideas and suggestions, as well as production.  We pledge to keep you updated every step of the way! 

Thank you very much for your trust and support!

Studio 2 Publishing is the sales, warehousing, and publishing partner of many game companies, including Pinnacle Entertainment, Exile Game Studio, Crafty Games, Engine Publishing, Hunters Books, Paradigm Concepts, TerrorBull Games, Reality Blurs, Third Eye Games, Alderac Entertainment, Dwarven Forge, Calliope Games, and Kuznia Gier. Not only do they have extensive production and distribution experience, but they also have six incredibly successful Kickstarter campaigns under their belt. With all this and their passionate love for the RPG hobby, Studio 2 Publishing is the ideal partner to help us run our campaign and assist us with printing and distribution.
Risks & Challenges​
The book is funded, so there's no risk of the project failing.  The book is currently in its editing phase, so it's developing nicely. However, as with all creative projects, delays may occur due to artwork issues, incorporating ideas and suggestions, as well as production.  We pledge to keep you updated every step of the way! 
Thank you very much for your trust and support!

story:
Hi all! 

We're really excited to bring you our first project from Singapore, which comes with affordable dice sets as well as a creative and innovative way to bring your dice to your next Dungeons and Dragons or Pathfinder game!

 Oh, did we only say dice? This baby is big enough to hold miniatures in it as well!

Our campaign offers tiers for backers who may only be interested in the affordable dice or the fancy dice holder or all of them!

Small Anubis Dice Holder

Small Anubis with Crimson Blue Marbled Dice

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Small Anubis with Blood Red Marbled Dice

Small Anubis with Sand Orange Marbled Dice

Large Anubis Dice Holder

Large Anubis with Crimson Blue Marbled Dice

Large Anubis with Blood Red Marbled Dice

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Large Anubis with Sand Orange Marbled Dice

Marbled Dice

Blood Red Marbled Dice under natural lighting

Crimson Blue Marbled Dice under natural lighting

Sand Orange Marbled Dice under natural lighting

The Anubis Dice Holder is light and easy to transport around as well! Awe your Dungeon Master and players when you whip this out the next game!

Why did we start this project?

We wanted a new and refreshing way to bring our dice to an Egyptian themed Dungeons and Dragons homebrew campaign and couldn't find the right fix, so we came up with the idea of an Anubis Dice Holder along with beautiful dice that we designed alongside our factories, using the core idea of oasis blue, the red colours of blood and the sand that will be aplenty.

With your help, perhaps we can come up with more innovative ways of coming up with products in the future! :)

Photos of Interior

 This is the rear view of the jar, so please take note!

Image was taken in natural lighting, not studio lighting

Image was taken in natural lighting, not studio lighting

Image was taken in natural lighting, not studio lighting

The small is 17 cm high and 11cm at the widest point around the middle. The medium is about 22cm high and 15cm at the widest area. 

The small holds 6 sets of dice approximately with room for more and 10 sets or so for the larger one with room to spare.

Wait, isn't this made in China?

Firstly, there is a layer of foam built into the insides of the jars, which the ones on other websites do not have - This is something we added onto in order to protect the dice.

Secondly, as for the product itself, it was originally manufactured with bronze and we are working with the manufacturers to use the material they recommended (Resin) and to include the built-in foam in order to ensure that our product is safe for dice carrying as well as for the miniatures.

Thirdly, the original products you see on mainstream websites are actually meant for the consumption of drinks, which means dry ice etc; can be placed inside, e.g placing your vodka shot glass in it, while ours is not meant for this purpose due to the layer of protective foam.

Featured On:

Justsaying.asia

story:
TO PURCHASE GO TO http://www.backporchmagick.com

Short Summary

Hello wanderers!

I'm Taryn Masterson of 'Tarot at Taryn's'. I've started a journey to fulfill a dream of mine that would make an affordable, compact, tarot deck that you can pick up and use immediately while you learn. 

 

Why Are We Doing This

Along my journey, while working at a festival next to an apple orchard in the north of New York, I came across Mama Kat. Mama Kat is a tarot reader, palmist, and intuitive that shares my equal passions for helping people get their sh*t together as well as pissing off people that play gatekeeper to spiritual growth. Between myself and Mama Kat, we've got about 50 years of tarot practice under our belts and nearly as many states under our feet. We share a story that doesn't get told as often as it should, but that we believe speaks to people everywhere. It's the story of the prodigal child that, instead of returning home in repentance, spends all of her days continuing her wild and urgent search for universal truths without yielding. Our story is the story of every young person that set out on a journey with little money and little time to be f*cked around. We know you. We are you. We made you something.

We imagine a young woman who goes on a walkabout to get her sh*t together. She doesn't have a tarot deck, but she knows tarot in her bones because she lives it. She travels, and as she learns universal truths, she jots down the notes that become this deck. It's old and beaten from seeing the floors of traincars and truckbeds. It's seen rain, mud, and coffee on good days. It is not rainbow wisdom that tells you what sounds good. It is a journal and a guide based on life that is raw and real.

This is the tarot of experience.

The Motivation

 

Maybe what this deck is, is a touchstone to women who aren't living it up so to speak. Tough, brassy broads that don't always get ahead, but they at least survive and do it well enough. That support each other and know what a good friend is. They're tuned to the mystical, but they don't expect butterfly winged fairies to drop bags of money to get them through the day.

And I'm not saying we're going to sell you a magic ticket to happiness. I'm saying that we might be able to point out some guideposts on the path.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The only real risk to overcome in this project is funding. Luckily, we were able to find printers that offer lower minimum orders without sacrificing quality which allowed us to set a low initial goal. We're projected to far exceed our minimum requirements.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help me get the word out. Tell anyone you think might be interested!
  • Use those Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

The Queens perk offers you a deck along with one of these mugs!

story:
At GeekOn! we take pride in engineering the most innovative, stylish, durable and functional boardgame bags and accessories on the planet.   

Sure you can get boardgame bags that are cheaper or re-purpose Swedish furniture store totes or drumbags but are they as comfortable, with as much padded protection, water-resistant, reinforced to hold 50 lbs, damn sexy looking and come with a Lifetime Guarantee? 

Didn't think so..       

 The GeekOn! Goal & Guarantee 

 

 

We also sent out some samples to some of our previous backers that had youtube channels so we could get some early feedback. Check out their initial thoughts!

 

 

 

 

Sure you can find game bags on the market for under $50 but in this case, as in most cases, you really get what you pay for! We believe that your expensive games deserve the most protected and comfortable bags and don't cut corners when it comes to quality as you'll see below.
 
The main objective of any game bag is to be able to carry a decent amount of games, card binders, figures, etc so we've designed our SPACEPAK with 47L of gaming space! That's enough space for 7 Chihuahua's or 48 cans of beer or ... well you get the point, it's a heck of a lot of space!  
 
 

 

 

The ShuttleTote is the perfect bag for those looking for a way to protect and easily carry many games but don't need to travel too far. It's also the ideal bag for those whose needs change from carrying a bunch of games to just a few including most of the above-average sized games.

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

  1. Decide how many dice you would like then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".
  2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  3. You will receive an email to choose your colors.
  4. We receive your color choices and prepare your shipment
  5. You receive your order and enjoy LUMA DICE in April 2016!


LUMA DICE


Playing games should always be a fun and magical experience. Our job is to deliver you the most exciting dice for playing all your tabletop adventures!

We have turned traditional dice on its head. Each side of dice lights up with different colored lights. The dice itself is carved from a solid block of aluminum and uses an accelerometer to detect motion to turn the lights on and off again when not being used.

Whether you’re into Dungeons & Dragons, board games or just a collector we think you'll love LUMA DICE as much as we do.

Happy rolling!

LUMA DICE TEAM


15 COLORS


List of colors: Black, Black (with white dots) Silver, Silver (with black dots), Gold, Space Grey, Midnight Blue, Light Blue, Green, Purple, Orange, Copper, Rose Gold, Yellow & Blood Red.

PROGRAMMING FEATURES


By far the most requested feature and we are ready to add this to LUMA DICE! You will now be able to change the color of the LED's on LUMA DICE. For example all blue or all red led's and of course raindow. 





Passer-by notices dice: "What is that, it looks cool!"  

Me: "It's LED dice"

Passer-by : "Wow, make me some please, MUST HAVE NOW!!"



Features of LED DICE

  • RGB LED's - Every dice has 21 RGB lights, each side with it's own color. The 6 side is blue, 5 side green, 4 side red, 3 side yellow, 2 side purple/pink and the 1 side cyan.
  • Motion Detection -LED DICE knows when you pick it up or roll it and the light activates. After 20 secs of no use, it turns off to save battery power. We do this by including an accelerometer which can detect any motion. We are very proud of this feature and hope you enjoy it!
  • Replaceable Battery - You can change the batteries easily. Just unscrew the top and take out the old batteries and put in the new ones. It uses two small 'SR54' batteries which are sold at supermarkets and you can buy on Amazon for less than $2!
  • Made from aluminum- LED DICE are made from the highest quality 6061 aluminum, carved from a solid block and very strong and durable that resists scratches, dents, and abuse. Very lightweight, only weighing 0.34 ounces or 9.5 grams
  • Produces fair rolls - LED DICE are well distributed across each side with regard to it's weight. We have done our best to balance them, but we can't guarantee perfect balance. We can guarantee however fair rolls and no heavy skews.
  • Stylish - With these you are looking nerdalicious!


Why LED DICE? 

We love games, and we love dice. Think about it, most games you played as a child and even today use dice. Memories of playing with friends and family everyone huddled around the table. Everyone taking their turn to roll the dice, having fun. So we wanted to turn it up a notch and create something unique while still preserving elements of the original design. It took a while but we finally did it and we think the result is amazing. And we hope you like it to.


SHARE & RECEIVE A FREE DICE BAG

By backing this project you are helping make this new project become a reality and as an added bonus any backer who shares this project will receive one free dice bag! So please share this project via social media, email and word of mouth to tell your friends and family about our campaign. Thank you in advance!

JUST CLICK THE SHARE BUTTONS AT THE TOP OF THE PAGE!


SPECIFICATIONS 

  • Standard 19 mm (0.74 inches) dice 
  • Chamfer corners for more momentum 
  • 21 RGB LED's 
  • Accelerometer 
  • Anodized finish 
  • SR54 Battery (replaceable) 
  • Weight 0.34 ounces (9.5 grams)


HOW IT WORKS & DEVELOPMENT

We spent many hours testing and designing all the electronics to make sure that LED DICE is beautiful inside and out. We have a whole new way to place LED's inside a dice. Using a flexible circuit board with RGB LED's, an accelerometer and a microcontroller (patent pending).

Placing flexible circuit board inside

Prototype flexible circuit board

Risks & Challenges

There is always potential challenges to every Kickstarter campaign. 
Everything is ready to go, but there is always the possibility for manufacture problems, delivery delay, missing delivery etc. But we are confident in our ability to get LUMA Dice to every single backer and we will do our best to keep to schedule.

Thank you for checking out our project

Game on!

LED DICE TEAM

story:
Several weeks ago, a meteor shower illuminated the night sky over the Grand Duchy of Reme. Most of the meteors burned up as they fell through the  atmosphere, leaving nothing but dust behind, but one punched through the sky to crash into a valley hidden within the Deepfells. The Clan of the Bloodied Paw, a group of gnolls living in these mountains, recovered it and presented the strange star-rock to their clan’s patron, an ancient mimic known as Yoov’fhek.
As Yoov’fhek toyed with the meteor, he cracked it open...

And then things began to get strange.

Blight of the Moonglow Glade is Frog God Games's official ARBOR DAY adventure! It's estimated at 24 pages, and is available for 5th Edition, Swords & Wizardry (OD&D) and first-edition Pathfinder. 

COVID-19 Effect: The printing for this adventure is done by a family-owned shop in Arizona, where a shelter-in-place order has just gone into effect, making us one of their largest customers. Sales like this also allow us to keep a stream of income moving to our freelance artists, authors, layout artists, and editors during the shut-downs. Frog God will come out of this crisis intact, so this isn't a "keep the doors open" plea, but we want to let you know that your purchase is one that you can feel comfortable about. It directly affects small businesses and households. We hope that all of you remain safe and well for the duration!

 

The Project 

Frog God Games is continuing our INDIEGOGO offerings with Blight of the Moonglow Glade. The Frog God Games projects on Indiegogo are simple, focused, and short.

Thus, INDIEGOGO projects by Frog God Games will-

  • Be short in duration
  • Be limited to a single title
  • Have options priced between $5-$30
  • Design all stretch goals and project bonus' affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
  • Be the only guaranteed method to get the premium* print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
  • Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit

*Premium means heavyweight glossy interior pages enhancing the art and color elements. The  thick, glossy cardstock brings out the vibrant color in Brett Barkley's cover illustration. These are the nicest softcover books we have ever sold and we only print a title this way once.

Any reprint would use print on demand service that, although nice, do not approach the quality of our INDIEGOGO funded books.

Why the Tiny Print Run?

Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.

This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.

Why not use Kickstarter?

We will still be using Kickstarter, frequently, for our large-scale projects. These smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.

Additionally, Frog God Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats. 

 

Product enhancements tied to project success 

During the 14 day primary project period for Blight of the Moonglow Glade and after the $1000 goal is met we will  improve the delivered product. There are no special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus, as total project funding increases the better the final product will be for everybody.

Examples of improvements or additional content increased funding would bring to Blight of the Moonglow Glade  -

  • Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure. 
  • The previous Indiegogo project added 2 interior art pieces and 3 extra creature illustrations for its appendix.
  • Printed Player map(s)/Insert. This is one we would love to do but it would require a substantial increase in overall project funding. For the Love of Valentine would be the best candidate yet for this.
  • Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (The rewards for both How Orcus Stole Christmas! and In Vino Gigantus included the new creature/NPC tokens and player maps). 
  • High-resolution files of illustrations to share with players at the table.

 

Project Delivery

PDF Perks

We will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.

The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.

Softcover Perks

Softcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. 

 

Overseas Shipping

NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive. We understand this. Likewise, some countries charge VAT tax or other fees to our customers on receipt. We cannot fraudulently lie about the value of materials we mail out. We are happy to ship you anything regardless of where you live, but we have to stay in business at the same time thus even our lightest books are affected. In the near future we expect to have a print on demand system in place for everyone overseas, It is not ideal, as the final book is not printed at the highest-quality when compared to the ones we fulfill in Indiegogo.

To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS

Several weeks ago, a meteor shower illuminated the night sky over the Grand Duchy of Reme. Most of the meteors burned up as they fell through the  atmosphere, leaving nothing but dust behind, but one punched through the sky to crash into a valley hidden within the Deepfells. The Clan of the Bloodied Paw, a group of gnolls living in these mountains, recovered it and presented the strange star-rock to their clan’s patron, an ancient mimic known as Yoov’fhek.As Yoov’fhek toyed with the meteor, he cracked it open...And then things began to get strange.Blight of the Moonglow Glade is Frog God Games's official ARBOR DAY adventure! It's estimated at 24 pages, and is available for 5th Edition, Swords & Wizardry (OD&D) and first-edition Pathfinder. COVID-19 Effect: The printing for this adventure is done by a family-owned shop in Arizona, where a shelter-in-place order has just gone into effect, making us one of their largest customers. Sales like this also allow us to keep a stream of income moving to our freelance artists, authors, layout artists, and editors during the shut-downs. Frog God will come out of this crisis intact, so this isn't a "keep the doors open" plea, but we want to let you know that your purchase is one that you can feel comfortable about. It directly affects small businesses and households. We hope that all of you remain safe and well for the duration! The Project Frog God Games is continuing our INDIEGOGO offerings with Blight of the Moonglow Glade. The Frog God Games projects on Indiegogo are simple, focused, and short.Thus, INDIEGOGO projects by Frog God Games will-
Be short in duration
Be limited to a single title
Have options priced between $5-$30
Design all stretch goals and project bonus' affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
Be the only guaranteed method to get the premium* print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit
*Premium means heavyweight glossy interior pages enhancing the art and color elements. The  thick, glossy cardstock brings out the vibrant color in Brett Barkley's cover illustration. These are the nicest softcover books we have ever sold and we only print a title this way once.Any reprint would use print on demand service that, although nice, do not approach the quality of our INDIEGOGO funded books.Why the Tiny Print Run?Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.Why not use Kickstarter?We will still be using Kickstarter, frequently, for our large-scale projects. These smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.Additionally, Frog God Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats.  Product enhancements tied to project success During the 14 day primary project period for Blight of the Moonglow Glade and after the $1000 goal is met we will  improve the delivered product. There are no special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus, as total project funding increases the better the final product will be for everybody.Examples of improvements or additional content increased funding would bring to Blight of the Moonglow Glade  -
Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure. 
The previous Indiegogo project added 2 interior art pieces and 3 extra creature illustrations for its appendix.
Printed Player map(s)/Insert. This is one we would love to do but it would require a substantial increase in overall project funding. For the Love of Valentine would be the best candidate yet for this.
Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (The rewards for both How Orcus Stole Christmas! and In Vino Gigantus included the new creature/NPC tokens and player maps). 
High-resolution files of illustrations to share with players at the table.
 Project DeliveryPDF PerksWe will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.Softcover PerksSoftcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo.  Overseas ShippingNOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive. We understand this. Likewise, some countries charge VAT tax or other fees to our customers on receipt. We cannot fraudulently lie about the value of materials we mail out. We are happy to ship you anything regardless of where you live, but we have to stay in business at the same time thus even our lightest books are affected. In the near future we expect to have a print on demand system in place for everyone overseas, It is not ideal, as the final book is not printed at the highest-quality when compared to the ones we fulfill in Indiegogo.To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS

story:
Welcome to the World of Veles

Dead Throne is a bold new board game that brings adventure, fantasy, player vs player and open world gameplay together. With Competitive, Solo and Co-Op modes to choose from it is a game for all. Set within a deep world, comprising over 2,400 years of history to explore, Dead Throne is a game like no other. With three ways to win, multiple side quests, open world gameplay, traps, magic, the ability to simply roam around killing things and a vast amount of options and tactics to implement, Dead Throne will keep you coming back for another round. Dead Throne opens up your world and allows you to be the masters of your own game. You make each game unique as you adapt your strategies for each new game set up. No game is ever the same as you explore a new world each time. Designed to be organised and fluid from the beginning and for all levels of experience, this is a game for the whole family to enjoy as well as long time gamers.

You have never played a game quite like this one.

 

 

 

The Mechanical Market

The Mechanical Market has been built to promote the game's fluidity and to maximise the organisation of the cards. Already built and assembled within the lid by the manufacturer, as soon as you receive the game you're ready to go.

Components:

The mechanical market is assembled with 5 layers of high density cardboard. Each layer serves a unique purpose and each function seamlessly together within the lid and under the market cover. 

  • Already assembled by our manufacturers.  
  • Built within the lid to organise the market. 
  • Market cards stay within it when packed away. 
  • Locks away by sliding up the lever and opens with ease by sliding the lever down. 
  • Propped up behind the base during gameplay.
  • Tested in its durability hundreds of times, you can be certain that it is built to last.

 

What's in the Box?

 

Gameplay

You can find all our gameplay videos and the rule book on our website here.

 

-- Objective

There are three ways of winning Dead Throne as well as multiple challenges and side quests.

  1. Collect all the unique items held by other players and return to the castle before being caught by your opponents.
  2. Defeat every other player to become the last player standing.
  3. Defeat Agrimor, a fire breathing dragon, to collect the king's crown and return to the castle to win.

-- Box and Game set up

  • 10, double sided, large hexagonal tiles make up the map.
  • 5min or less set up time and pack away time.
  • New game each time with different map set up, strategies, game flow, cards and more.
  • Everything organised within the box already.

-- The Map

The tiles will make up the map. Each modular and unique, every game will be unique. You can see all the tiles here.

  • Each of the 10 tiles has their own unique art and features.
  • Large and beautifully detailed to immerse yourself within Lirennor.
  • 24.5cm from side to side.
  • 10, double sided, hexagonal tiles make up the map.
  • Can be connected in any way you like allowing for a new game each time.
  • Multiple paths to take, choices to make and features to interact with can be found on each tile. Traps are hidden and some quests direct you to specific locations found around the map.
  • Four different regions, each with their own level of difficulty and reward.
  • Each region has its own style, featuring lakes, mountains, fields and forests.
  • Tiles can be flipped over and twisted around, even during gameplay with the use of magical scrolls.

-- Moving and Interacting

  • Four custom, six sided dice to move with.
  • Land when you choose to, or when you reach your limit.
  • Use magical scrolls to teleport, carriage-men to travel between towns, relics and more to quickly navigate the map.
  • Interact with whatever you land on.
  • Each region offers unique rewards and challenges.

-- Battles

  • Between two or more players.
  • Battle creatures you find around the land.
  • Defeat creatures by inflicting more damage onto them than they did to you.
  • Defeat players by taking all their health down. 
  • You can end a battle by fleeing or calling a truce.
  • Join ongoing battles between other players.
  • Those in a battle or in the market do so in their own bubble when there are 4 or more players. Other players keep playing around them as normal so they don't have to wait.
  • Use magical scrolls to summon creatures to your aid, increase your weapons power, conjure new weapons, block opponents' attacks and much more.
  • Use weapons and armour you find around Lirennor in battle. As you progress you will become more powerful by equipping stronger items.
  • Combine items together to create weapon combos.

-- Traps and Quests

  • Trap your opponents throughout the gameplay with upgradable and hidden traps that are scattered around the land.
  • Tackle side quests to receive their rewards. Some quests are for all to compete for so you must be quick unless you want your opponents to get that ancient and powerful weapon.

 

-- Solo Play

  • Four ways of winning during the solo version. 
  • Play as one of the six heroes, Saladar doesn't play. 
  • The dragon, Agrimor is constantly getting stronger and chasing you. 

1) Defeat creatures and progress depending on their level. 

2) Complete quests to progress. 

3) Get half way on both challenges. 

4) Defeat Agrimor and collect the crown of the king, then return it to the castle.

 

-- Co-Op Mode - Defender Mode

  • 1-4 players making this a Co-Op mode as well as another solo mode.
  • When between 2-4 players you will defend the towns of Lirennor from an ever expanding hoard of beasts.
  • Enemies will come out from everywhere and try to destroy the towns. Can you stick together or must you spread yourselves thin?
  • The game will increase in difficulty as you progress eventually leading you to battle Agrimor himself.

-- Scrolls

  • 150 known magical scrolls.
  • Used to increase your attack and defense, mitigate your opponents' attacks, heal yourself or others, summon creatures, conjure weapons, enchant items, teleport around the land and even flip and twist map tiles around.
  • Start with three and obtain more to become more powerful.
  • Constantly discarding and replacing so you never know what you or your opponents might have.

The Card Tray

The card tray has been designed to manage your inventory of items. Each type of item has its own place allowing you to visualise and manage your cards within a smaller space. They have been designed to be half the size of a map tile allowing them to fit into each space seamlessly.

The Dead Throne Box

  • 52 x 38 x 9cm in size.
  • Built with a focus on organisation in mind.
  • Everything is contained within its own compartments from the beginning allowing for quick set up time and quick pack away time.
  • The insert is made of solid plastic for optimal space management. 
  • All the cards are held within tuck boxes, and the awesome mechanical market held within the lid will lock to make sure no cards fall out.
  • The box, card tray and market have all been designed to allow for card sleeves.
  • Tokens and other pieces are held within their compartments so that they don't move about either.
  • The box can already accommodate future expansion packs so that you won't have to deal with multiple boxes for the same game.
  • The box has been designed to work with the gameplay rather than just be put aside. Everything works together, both within the game, and between the box and the game, for an awesome playing experience.

The World of Veles

Dead Throne is played within the southern kingdom of Lirennor.

 

You can see the full timeline on our website here.

Over 2,400 years of recorded history completes what we know of the world of Veles.

The Darkness is the only word used to describe what happened before our earliest record. Today it is 2410 ATD (after The Darkness) and the Kingdom of Lirennor has seen better times.

- The first significant note in recorded history is in the year 120 ATD. Magic pouring out from the ground and in all things born from nature. The Jinn were the first creatures who used magic and it wasn’t long before mankind began using the Jinn and focusing and learning the magical ways. These first were known as the enchanters.

- In 701 ATD the Kingdom of Lirennor is founded by King Terrowin. He was known as a great leader and conqueror.

- In 934 the enchanters were banished for causing massive earthquakes and destroying the land in their experiments with the new environmental scrolls. Thirty-one years later the mages took their oath. They vowed to protect and serve mankind against creatures and humans who sought nothing but chaos.

- 1250 ATD marks the year of the discovery of the great gold mines in Stonesea, a region of Lirennor. Lirennor becomes rich and powerful, but this wealth comes at a cost.

- In 1711 some of the mages are banished from the council as evidence of them turning dark spreads fear of The Darkness returning. Following this, many of the exiled mages turn to necromancy. They summon an army of undead and attack the Kingdom of Eirwen.

- 1824 ATD was a year of death. It was the height of the hunt for dark mages requested by the people. People from all the Kingdoms were rounded up and executed if they were suspected of practicing magic. The mages' council carried out these executions and although sanctioned in the beginning the people quickly began to distrust them. The final straw was of the execution of Gwen Hildegard, beloved princess of Lirennor. The mages became the official heads of police and abused their new power. It wasn’t long before the people responded with violence. And in 1915 the mages move their great library of scrolls away from the people who they feared. Tensions continue to rise, attacks by exiled mages and the people on the mages' council take place and in 1951 the council close their doors.

- In 1970 ATD the Fable Wars begin. The mages declare war on all the Kingdoms of Veles trying to take power for themselves. After many defeats Veles finally push back under the command of General Lothean. The mages are banished to Blood Stained Mountain and unheard from again for over 100 years.

- In 2085 the mages return. For years they have been building an army of undead that they use to desimate the Kingdoms of Veles. Only Lirennor remains but not for long. Gwiladith was an explorer and hero. She entered Blood Stained Mountain in 2098 and destroyed the source of the power controlling the undead army. The Battle of the Iron Gates ends with the death of the mages and Veles is finally free from evil. But not for long. Agrimor, a gold thirsty dragon enters Lirennor after the gold in the mines in 2312 and nothing is ever the same again.

Who we are

Contact:

email: contact@sharkeegames.co.uk 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorldofVeles

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WorldofVeles 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sharkeegames/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3Y5-_92cdVRx1Fes74Lrlw 

BGG: https://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/228724/dead-throne 

Website: http://www.deadthrone.co.uk

 

Shipping

The estimated delivery date is January 2019.

Free customs worldwide included in each pledge.

FREE SHIPPING included in your pledge. 

Any customs will have already been handled by us allowing for friendly shipping to all destinations. Individual shipping costs have also been handled for most countries (E.U., U.S.A., Canada, Australia, New Zealand and many more) offering free shipping to those countries. Countries with free shipping are: United Kingdom, Norway, Switzerland, United States, Australia, New Zealand, E.U., American Samoa, Solomon Islands, Brunei, Cambodia, China, Northern Mariana Islands, Cook Islands, Fiji, Guam, Indonesia, India, Japan, Kiribati, South Korea, Laos, Mexico, Malaysia, New Caledonia, Niue, Vanuatu, Nauru, Papua New Guinea, Macao, Marshal Islands, Philippines, Puerto Rico, Russia, Singapore, Thailand, Tonga, Tuvalu, Taiwan, Vietnam, Virgin Islands (U.S.), Samoa, Hong Kong. 

Costs for countries without free shipping is an extra £25 (~$33).

- We will freight our games in bulk to North America, E.U., Australia and Shanghai. From then on our fulfillment partners will dispatch each individual game to our backers' given addresses around the world. Given how shipping times will vary from location to location we must apologize that some backers will receive their reward later than others. However we won't stop until each and every backer receives their just reward.

- In the unlikely event that damage occurs or shipments are lost we will handle everything. Getting your reward into your hands is our priority :)

Copyright

SharkeeGames Ltd. reserves all rights to Dead Throne the board game. Including all art, illustrations, rules and designs.

Risks and challenges

The story, the rules, the entirety of the structure and the layout of all the cards have been completed already. All that is needed before we can start manufacturing is the remaining artwork.

The remaining art will have to be finished quickly and all the pre-production steps will have to be done quickly too. We will strive to send them as early as possible, but we will not sacrifice quality to meet this aim. Our goal is and always will be to send our backers the best possible game we can. And, of course, we will keep you updated every step of the way as we are in this adventure together.

We have done extensive research into our distribution methods, mapping every step of the way and are confident that it will run smoothly through our tried and tested fulfillment centers and freighter. However, we are prepared for any issues that might arise as delivering your game is our priority. If there are any delays, date changes or shipping issues you will be the first to know not only what happened but what we are doing to amend it.

I hope you enjoy the adventure and we look forward to sending our game to you, our glorious backers :)

The story, the rules, the entirety of the structure and the layout of all the cards have been completed already. All that is needed before we can start manufacturing is the remaining artwork.
The remaining art will have to be finished quickly and all the pre-production steps will have to be done quickly too. We will strive to send them as early as possible, but we will not sacrifice quality to meet this aim. Our goal is and always will be to send our backers the best possible game we can. And, of course, we will keep you updated every step of the way as we are in this adventure together.
We have done extensive research into our distribution methods, mapping every step of the way and are confident that it will run smoothly through our tried and tested fulfillment centers and freighter. However, we are prepared for any issues that might arise as delivering your game is our priority. If there are any delays, date changes or shipping issues you will be the first to know not only what happened but what we are doing to amend it.
I hope you enjoy the adventure and we look forward to sending our game to you, our glorious backers :)

story:
Puzzles nowadays are so simple, straightforward, with limited playability. Most of them only requires one type of thinking skill/cognitive ability to solve and therefore does not challenge the whole brain. Once solved, they are shoved away, forgotten, as they don't provide the challenge anymore.  They haven't evolved at all since the 20th century. 

That, is why we create CRYPTED.

CRYPTED is a combination of puzzles. It features 9 puzzles from the likes of Cryptograms to sliding blocks. While most puzzles test one or two skills, CRYPTED can challenge even veteran puzzle solvers with its broad skill requirements. 

CRYPTED is entirely rewindable. Once solved, it could be put back together and play again, or used as a treasure chest.

 

Design Elements

We have managed to fit 9 puzzles into the CRYPTED Box with room to spare!

All the mechanisms are neatly tucked away inside the hexagonal box. So all you can see are the beautifully designed interfaces. Each of the eight faces are linked in a way that the box can only be opened once all puzzles are solved.

CRYPTED box can be enjoyed even after all puzzles are solved. Keep stuff in secret compartments, lock away valuables or secrets and decorate your living room with playable puzzles.

 

Featured Puzzles

CRYPTED Puzzle Box features 9 individual puzzles from 6 categories:

  • Cryptogram: Are you good at code breaking? Will you be able to decipher the codes and understand the CRYPTED language?
  • Burr Puzzle (Interlocking puzzle): Can you remember this wooden puzzle from when you were little? This will definitely help bring back some memories.
  • Klotski Puzzle (Sliding block puzzle): Most people are familiar with this game on their smartphone. So we decided to take it up a notch and create a really difficult one. Some of us are still trying to solve it right now!
  • Jigsaw Puzzle: Completing a Jigsaw puzzle takes time, memory and concentration. Rest assured, Jigsaw puzzles in CRYPTED won't be in flat pieces of cardboard paper.
  • Riddle: Who doesn't love a good riddle, It challenge our brain, make us look at things from different angles.
  • Hidden Compartment: Can you see me? You can't see Me.

 

Benefit

Puzzle box are beneficial to everybody! Here are the main reasons we love them:

  • Improve Memory: Puzzles like Jigsaw can help improve memory skill.
  • Improve IQ: Test your logic and reasoning skills with tough puzzles
  • Cognitive Ability: Improve your cognitive ability by visualising  how parts fit together or move together
  • Problem Solving: Use critical thinking to figure out the mechanism behind the puzzle.
  • Patience: Solving puzzle can require time, focus, and patience. Don't bring out the crowbar just yet!
  • Social skill: Team up with a friend to deal with the frustration of difficult puzzles
  • Relax: Puzzles, especially ones that you already know how to solve, can provide some peace of mind. Like an escape from such a chaotic world. 

CRYPTED is not just a puzzle box, it can also be used for:

  • Home Decoration: It's beautiful! showcase it in your living room to amuse visitors or play with it yourselve when you're bored.
  • Keep Secrets: lock up important stuffs or dark secrets, have your friends try to hack into it enthusiastically while you hides the final key in your pocket.
  • A Perfect Gift: Do you know someone who loves puzzle? They'll love CRYPTED.
  • A Challenge: Rewind the puzzle and send them to your friend for a challenge. Time their trial and earn your bragging rights.

There are more ways to enjoy CRYPTED Puzzle box. You just need to explore!

 

Rewards

For more retail information, please contact us at info@crypted.store

 

Stretched Goals

We are open to any suggestions on what to offer as stretched goals. Any cool/wacky ideas are welcome!

 

Shipping & Handling

Since Shipping cost depend heavily on project size and destination, it will be collected after project is funded via Backerkit. This enables us to get the best shipping rate to everyone, everywhere. One CRYPTED weights ~1.5kg and may increase after certain stretch goals are unlocked.

Estimate shipping costs are:

  • USA: $15-$25 for most states.
  • CANADA: $15-$25.
  • LATIN AMERICA: $25-$35
  • EUROPE: $20-$30
  • ASIA: $20-$30
  • OCEANIA: $20-$30
  • AFRICA: $25-$35

Please keep in mind that these are estimates and are likely to change(for the better) with project size.

 

Project timeline

*Please note that this is only an estimate of the project timeline. It could shift for the better or worse. We will keep updating this timeline as the project proceed.

 

Risks & Challenges

While there are certainly challenges in getting 3D models into production, we have tried our best to prepare for production and minimise lead time. Injection moulding facilities have been contacted and are ready for production once all details are finalised. We will be overseeing the production and assembling process ourself to ensure maximum quality control. 

We promise you a weekly update on this project from the moment it is funded, till the last backer receives their reward.

Every support and share is indispensable. We are forever grateful for your support.

Thank you,  gracious God, for being with us and guiding us all the way through this project. May your name be forever exalted.

story:
It’s D-Day. June 6th, 1944. At dawn, the Allies send the greatest armada the world has ever known against German-occupied France. As the first wave of Allied soldiers step out of their landing craft, they are mowed down by machine-gun fire. You are one of these soldiers. And you’re not going to lay there, waiting to be killed. It’s do or die! You start moving, and shout to your comrades… “Follow me!”

D-Day Dice Overview

In D-Day Dice, players are Allied soldiers trying to organise improvised units for an attack against a machine-gun nest. Each player starts the game with a unit of a few soldiers and nothing else. As the game progresses, players roll dice to collect resources and advance on the beach, sector by sector, as the unit grows stronger and deadlier.

D-Day Dice will get you right there on the beach. You will experience the fear of getting killed by enemy fire, the anguish of losing your men, and the thrill of surmounting seemingly impossible odds to accomplish your mission. And since this is a cooperative game, all players are on the same side, fighting like brothers (and sisters) in arms! This game can be played by anyone (you don't have to be familiar with World War II) and has been enjoyed by families and wargamers alike.

What you'll get:

 

The Campaign has already been massively successful on Kickstarter, with a plethora of freebies unlocked. If you pledge here you will get exactly the same as the original pledgers and will be added to the Pledge Manager (in early Feb 2018), where you will be able to add any number of addons.

story:
Fed up of getting only junk mail? Looking for something with a bit more thrill?

Cosykiller is a ground breaking project - it's not a book, it's not a board game, it's not a dinner party - it's a story line, which allows YOU as the detective to solve a murder set in the "golden age of fiction".

Each box is packed with clues, keepsakes and mementos which you need to review and unravel. What is important? What is critical to solving the crime? Who are the suspects? Do you have what it takes to piece together the evidence to make a coherent whole? It's like an Agatha Christie novel but with you playing Miss Marple! No conclusions are drawn; the puzzling and detection is up to you.

CosyKiller is the brainchild of Red Herring Games LTD - award winning specialist murder mystery providers who have been taking the world by storm for over 10 years. They have supplied murder mystery events for small dinner parties’ right through to conferences and brand activation activities for major corporations.

We plan to have the first box ready for Christmas - so if you want to be the FIRST to play CosyKiller - sign up now. Our Indiegogo scheme offers the subscription plan at a massive discount, AND you get extras too! It would be a fantastic present for a super sleuth who need a year full of puzzling treats!

Please do share our project with friends you think might be interested. For us - this is as much about raising awareness of a new product in the market place as it is about getting the funding.

story:
The Machu Picchu Vol.2 are... the best kind of weird :D. 

They are:

the world's first 4 elements dice :3

a blend between 3 kinds of awesome craftsmanship,

a symbol for a truly fascinating corner of the world.                 

This way, something as simple as a dice design becomes an opportunity to create something incredibly unique. We feel confident to say there's really nothing quite like them.

 Choose between ANY of our AWESOME designs and wood types :o 

KLAZIK

They might remind you of the classic dice design, yet they are not. We take on the classic forms and transform them into something bold and new.

APU

'Apu' is quechua for 'mountain-god'. We wanted something simple, that would take inspiration of elements and forms found in the Inca culture and its landscape, and give back something different and beautiful.

CALENDAR

For these, we use gorgeous iconography from the annual calendar of the Incas, as well as the chakana (Inca’s symbol for the Tree of Life). A masterpiece.

PACHA

Inspired by 'Pachamama', the inca goddess known as the mother of earth and time, this beautiful design embraces and evolves upon traditional iconography from the Andes.

AYAHUASCA

Inspired by the concept of ancestral ritual of Ayahuasca, which traditionally was believed as a way to reach a more clear and profound state of conscience and catarsis... through a intricate mixture of visions and reality.

Last campaign was amazing. We are immensely grateful to everyone who: first believed in us, then gave us such heart whelming comments and feedback, and finally... encouraged us to come back :) We owed it to them to do it right! 

So... we tested, tested and then tested some more. We tried many new materials and toolings. We've been hopeful and discouraged... excited and depressed... jumping around and flat on the floor.. Until (finally!)...

With Vol. 2, we get to present our best dice to date. And a beautiful blend between four amazing materials:

  1. High quality 950 silver: We find 950/1000 to be the best composition for the job.
  2. Natural gemstones: Chrysocolla, lapis lazuli, sodalite.
  3. Natural seashells
  4. Beautiful wood: We tested many varieties and found walnut and mahogany to be the best fit because of it color and finish.

It's ALL KINDS of cool to say it out loud: these are the World's First 4 Elements Dice!

It didn't come easy though. It took navigating between countless artisan's shops, trying to find the best team for a job never done before. It took finding the perfect balance between three different branches of masterful craftsmanship.

  1. Jewelry making: We work with incredible talented artisans with over 15 years of experience making beautiful silver jewelry.
  2. Wood carving: We tried many kinds of woodworkers, and find the perfect fit with a shop dedicated to the delicate art of making musical instruments. After some prototyping, we felt in love with the finish they were able to deliver to their finished product.
  3. Stone carving: This guys are masters at turning  gorgeous gemstones into perfect puzzle pieces for our silver framed designs.

We brought together a team of people tremendously talented and excited about bringing these project to life. A truly A-Team.

We took the amazing feedback from our first campaign and made it primary guideline. The result?

  1. More precise inlays: We are working very fine tooling to achieve clean cuts.
  2. Greater durability:  Wood's toughness and tenacity makes it a great material for the hard life a dice has to endure :P 
  3. Better balance: The finer tooling and wood's density allows us to maintain a better center of gravity.

We wanted to go more on detail about the design of each side. Here it goes!

Xierra is a crazy little company with a big dream: to keep craftsmanship alive, current and relevant. We want to build products that give local artisans the opportunity to reach and share their amazing work to the world. One crazy little product at the time :)

We'll said it once again: we can not thank our backers enough! You guys turned our crazy little idea into a reality, you supported us during our first fulfillment process, and you continue to encourage us to work harder every day. You are real-life heroes, and we are thinking about tattooing ourselves with the full list of your names. Ok, that last part is a figurative speech, but still! You guys rock.

We would also have this list of awesome friends and family, who have been an amazing help during this process, thank you... your beautiful humans you:

Carolina Chavez | Elizabeth Ramos | Milagros Avila | Wendy Gonzales | Christina Whitton | Ke Nguyen | Jamey Stegmaier | Carlos Andres Gomez | William Suechting IV | Martin Gil Medina | Kacha Torn | Antonio Ferrara | Douglas J. Costello | Nimrod Back | Matthew O'Malley | Vladislav Meshanin | Javier Gomez | Sergio Franco | Timothy Hemingway | David Lawrence | Tim Cook | Michael Schäffer | Hajime Noguchi

We would also like to thank the amazing artist behind the copyright-free music used in our video. Links below:

JPB - High [NCS Release] https://youtu.be/Tv6WImqSuxA | SoundC... Facebook https://www.facebook.com/jayprodbeatz | Twitter https://twitter.com/gtaanis Instagram&nbsp...

All cards in the table: we are low-budget, high-spirited individuals... And we would really REALLY appreciate any kind of social media sharing, if you feel like it :) 

We need heroes like YOU. Please help us spread the word to the world!
