story:
Something new, something old

Fairytale is a game first and foremost about, well, Fairytales. Mimicking their structure and themes heavily, the game works around a unique mechanic, which by its Fairytale counterpart is called Morals.

Fairytale is very divergent from most traditional RPGs, which is a little ironic, considering how traditional the subject matter is. But it's all necessary to make the game work and feel like a fairytale.

How does it work?

There are some layers to how Fairytale's basic gameplay works.

  • The Narrator defines the Morals of each story and game session.
  • Alongside normal roleplaying, the players will encounter these morals, and the morals will affect the rolls they make.
  • When a difficult situation is starting to resolve, the players' rolls will define what approaches they can use in which situations to what effect, but regardless of how well they roll, using the wrong approach means the player will suffer more than from just failing.
  • The wrong approach is mostly defined by common sense and morals of the story.

The preliminary document and any updates to the game can be read on my website.

Why crowdfunding?

Short version, I need to pay my artist and editor, and to feed myself.

I am a very labor-intensive and quite the resourceful person. I can do pretty much everything from layouting, general graphic design and writing myself. So had I the ability to do absolutely everything myself, I would. But I don't trust my skills in artistry and editing. And those things don't come free.

Additionally, I have little income outside of making games, so crowdfunding seems like the obvious path to take. 

Perks

Aiding me on this journey at all nets you access to the game's Discord server before its launch, and with it, the access to the playtest version of the game. 

Tiers for the physical copies of the game are the same cost, for a very good reason. Read the next chapter to find out why.

Postage and Printage

The copies of the game will be sent through DrivethruRPG. For physical copies, you need to pay for the shipping and possibly printing, because figuring all of this out alone is really hard.

The postage is a wild card, depending on your country. I can't affect it

The printing will cost around 3-5€ / 4-6$ for softcover, 7-9€ / 8-10$ for hardcover, depending on the length of the game and whether the artwork will be in full color.

Stretch Goals

I will include some stretch goals beyond the 4000€ funding, but I am not going to invest too heavily on bonus materials, because I can't really come up with anything more to give.

Art upgrades

Custom Tokens (Includes a perk for them)

Custom Dice (Includes a new perk for said dice, and another for both tokens and dice)

Book of Tales

Put your mouth where your money is

If you like the idea for this game, you can share the project, character ideas and art under #FairytaleRPG to get the word out, even if you can't help the funding.

Short version, I need to pay my artist and editor, and to feed myself.
I am a very labor-intensive and quite the resourceful person. I can do pretty much everything from layouting, general graphic design and writing myself. So had I the ability to do absolutely everything myself, I would. But I don't trust my skills in artistry and editing. And those things don't come free.
Additionally, I have little income outside of making games, so crowdfunding seems like the obvious path to take. 
Perks
Aiding me on this journey at all nets you access to the game's Discord server before its launch, and with it, the access to the playtest version of the game. 
Tiers for the physical copies of the game are the same cost, for a very good reason. Read the next chapter to find out why.
Postage and Printage
The copies of the game will be sent through DrivethruRPG. For physical copies, you need to pay for the shipping and possibly printing, because figuring all of this out alone is really hard.
The postage is a wild card, depending on your country. I can't affect it
The printing will cost around 3-5€ / 4-6$ for softcover, 7-9€ / 8-10$ for hardcover, depending on the length of the game and whether the artwork will be in full color.

Stretch Goals
I will include some stretch goals beyond the 4000€ funding, but I am not going to invest too heavily on bonus materials, because I can't really come up with anything more to give.
Art upgrades
Custom Tokens (Includes a perk for them)
Custom Dice (Includes a new perk for said dice, and another for both tokens and dice)
Book of Tales

Put your mouth where your money is
If you like the idea for this game, you can share the project, character ideas and art under #FairytaleRPG to get the word out, even if you can't help the funding.

story:
The Story So Far...

Hi everyone! I'm Matt and I'm bringing a tabletop games and comic book shop to Gloucester, working with my wife we aim to bring this much needed shop to the streets and put our own spin on things.

The plan itself has been in it's planning stage for a long time and we'll soon be in a position to open. We're currently in the process of trying to secure a premises but the options appear to be few and far between so we're running a crowd funding campaign to help raise funds to put towards a bigger and better premises. As a workaround whilst we look and try to secure something, we're bringing ourselves to Gloucester's outdoor market. We're really eager to get out there and our customers are equally eager see us out there.

Here's what our customers are already saying on our Facebook page:

"About time we had a comic shop here"

"Can't wait for you to open."

"Really chuffed an independent gaming shop is heading our way. Haven't been to the other gaming shop for a very long time."

"Mtg too?! Dammit I just got out!! Good job I didn't sell my cards!!"

"Absolutely hyped for this. Haven't been able to play magic in the last 2 years so will be nice to get back into it with other fans and players"

"The city needs you!"

After reviewing our business plan, cutting some costs and rearranging some of our plans we believe we can now accommodate a higher cost of premises both short and long term but still need to make up the difference between what we have and the what we need for initial costs of moving in. This normally equates to 3 - 6 months rent and potentially 3 - 6 months rent again for a deposit amongst other things. By performing some cost saving measures, we were able to make some of this up ourselves but now we need to make up the rest, this is where you come in.

Our goal is £3,250 and in the grand scheme of things it seems like a relatively small amount, but it will absolutely make all the difference and increase our options of what premises will be available to us exponentially.

We originally considered more traditional methods of raising more funding but decided on crowd funding as it gives us a unique platform to interact with our customers and allows us to provide some fantastic rewards and experiences as part of the process. It also allows our customers to be part of our creation.

The Shop...

As you would expect we're passionate about games and comics but the idea came around when I attended a tournament for Warhammer 40,000. My army was far from up to the task, eventually coming second from last but I still came away feeling like I had a great day. The community (I didn't know anyone there at the time), the camaraderie, the organisation, it was all there and I knew at that point that I wanted to run a store, not only recreate these experiences through a multitude of games and events but also improve on them, having every customer leave at the end of the day feeling they had a great time at our shop and counting the hours until they can come back. I spent some time working for Games Workshop which was also a fantastic experience and only fuelled the fire of opening our own shop.

I've also been a fan of comic books for as long as I can remember and I've found over the years that these two hobbies cross over on a regular basis with each other so I decided to combine the two into a single shop. I launched an online comic book subscription service which in itself was successful but was ultimately stopped when I realised it was the bricks and mortar store that I craved, the face to face interaction, not simply selling them.

In store you can expect to find games such as Warhammer 40,000, Age of Sigmar, Infinity and Bolt Action, TCGs, LCGs, RPGs and comic books from your favourite publishers with related merchandise such as toys, gifts and clothing. We're also in the process of designing our very own gear (some of which you'll be able to find as perks here!).

We'll be running regular events in store such as tournaments, painting competitions, painting lessons from professional miniature painters, Dungeons & Dragons campaigns, regular Magic the Gathering events and so, so much more. This is far from an exhaustive list but should give an idea of what we're trying to achieve.

We've planned a rough layout of the shop and how we envisage how it will look, we're looking to split inventory of games and comics equally with a smaller section for pop culture. This coincides with the market research we've performed locally as well as further afield and will be adjusted as and when required. The shop itself will be as open and as least cluttered as possible with emphasis on being able to navigate through the store without the need the say "oops, sorry" when we're at our busiest. This will all be taken into consideration when selecting our premises.

We also have a loyalty scheme planned, not only will you be rewarded for your loyalty to the store by buying through us but also for being a great community player, for example, helping others play games, running RPG campaigns etc which will help promote the community spirit which we strive for in store.

When a customer enters the store we want to give them the best possible experience by providing excellent customer service, offering an open and inviting shop, a community experience, exciting events for everyone, regardless of skill level and ensuring that when that customer has left, they'll be wanting to come back as soon as possible, whether that person has come from Gloucester or not.

Our commitment to running our shop:

  • Open and inviting to all
  • Clean, tidy and well lit shop
  • No pressurised sales
  • Well stocked snacks and drinks including tea and coffee
  • A safe environment
  • Comfortable and exciting atmosphere
  • Clean toilets on site
  • Knowledgable and friendly staff
  • Wide array of choices
  • Exciting events - all publicly available and easily accessible.
  • Demo games across all games we stock
  • Space to play

Whilst we were researching our name we settled on Geek Within to represent the little (or big) geek within all of us. To be able to indulge your inner geek regardless of who you are or where you're from, and for that, we have to make the best possible shop and be open and inviting to everyone.

What do you get?

We've thought long and hard about what rewards to provide and we've come up with rewards that would cater to those who will regularly frequent the shop, those who won't and those who are our most dedicated of fans and want the very best from us.

With every pledge, you have directly helped us and we want to tell the world that you've helped us get there, that's why with every pledge you will have your name immortalised on our website as a thank you for helping making this happen.

We've also added some early bird versions of our perks for those quickest off the mark, hurry though, there's not many!

Please note that for reasons out of our control, final designs may vary slightly.

£10 - Founders Mug

You'll get your name immortalised on our website. You'll also get a founders mug.

£10 - Geek Within Dice

You'll get your name immortalised on our website. You'll also get a set of 16 Geek Within dice.

£25 - Messenger Bag

You'll get your name immortalised on our website. You'll also get a messenger bag, ideal for carrying smaller games, rule books or comic books.

£40 - Bag of Holding

You'll get your name immortalised on our website. You'll also get a bag of great merchandise including a founders mug, a set of Geek Within D6 dice, a dice bag and a t-shirt.

£30 - Comic Book Subscription

You'll get your name immortalised on our website. You'll also get a 12 issue comic book subscription starting after we've opened.

£30 - Events Voucher

You'll get your name immortalised on our website. You'll also get a £30 voucher to be put towards in store paid events such as tournaments or painting lessons.

£125 - Pre Launch Party

For our most dedicated of fans. You will be invited to store the night before the store's launch with a small number of others. You'll get a tour of the store, the chance to buy before anyone else, play some games and eat pizza! Lots of pizza. You'll also walk away with a Bag of Holding...with a few extras.

And of course you'll get your name immortalised on our website.

Stretch Goals

As mentioned above we made cuts to some of our plans in order to raise funds for our bigger store. These plans are still happening but will likely be further down the line after we've opened. We've decided to put these cuts as stretch goals if we meet our target.

Stretch Goal 1 - £4,000

TV and Video Equipment - As an alternative to music playing in store which can be surprisingly costly, a large screen TV will be mounted in store to play episodes of Critical Role, battle reports, game trailers, how-to-play videos and other episodes of your favourite YouTube shows. It will also be used to show episodic content we have produced ourselves!

Purchases:

  • TV
  • Cabling and mount

Stretch Goal 2 - £6,500

Video production hardware and software. This will be used to produce our very own set of videos to be added to YouTube and social media and will also allow us to stream content of our major events to Twitch.

Purchases:

  • PC
  • Camera
  • Sony Vegas
  • Accessories

More stretch goals will be revealed if these goals are met.

In closing...

As you can see, we have big plans and if we can get over this final hurdle we can bring this shop to Gloucester sooner and with your help we can make it bigger and better. We believe there is always room for improvement and will make every penny count.

Thank you for taking the time to read through this and if you pledge, thank you for being part of it.

Please, help us spread the word by sharing with your friends, family and on social media.

Hopefully we'll see you in store soon!

FAQ

Will there be a web store?

Yes, but only once we've settled in our shop. Our focus will be, and always will be our bricks and mortar shop(s).

When will you be open?

It's hard to say, unfortunately we're at the mercy of the local rental market to find the perfect premises and we don't want to rush into it. Our goal is April but the sooner the better. We will of course be open in Gloucester's outdoor market from November 2017 until we find somewhere.

Will you be stocking...?

Probably, but if we don't, we'll be offering a free order in service. Essentially if we can source it, you'll be able to purchase it.

What if the funding goal isn't met?

This campaign won't be the end of us if the campaign isn't successful. You'll still see us on the high street. This campaign allows us to explore more options when searching for our premises, making  bigger and better and ultimately accelerating the process.

Can I pledge more than once?

Absolutely, however as Indiegogo does not support multiple pledges at once, each pledge must be processed separately. Simply make a pledge then return and make another as often as you like.

story:
HOW AM I WEIRD - Game Play

 

 

 

Do you like chicken dancing? Sleeping in a curtain? Licking your TV screen? Have you dated your dog? HOW AM I WEIRD is a game for the weird and wonderful.

Gameplay is simple. Each player takes 1 blank Weirdo card and 8 Comeback cards. Turn over a Life card and choose the weirdest and funniest Comeback answer to win a round.

Life cards present a situation - sometimes awkward or embarrassing, sometimes annoying or familiar, and sometimes all of these at the same time. For example, ‘You are on an airplane and the woman sitting next to you is sick in her lap’.

Comeback cards present responses that are weird and wonderful. So you could …. ‘Fantasise about riding a horse with them’. Or ‘Light a fire using their socks’. Or even ‘Prepare a salad’. 

Weirdo cards are weapons of creativity. Each player takes one at the start of the game and keeps it throughout as if it’s their baby. Use weirdo cards for freestyling, which means letting out the weirdness inside you. Let yourself go. Show how weird you really are. 

Some horrible person behind you jumps the queue. What would you do?

 

Maybe you would prefer sexy astronauts, but it's the Big Weird Chief who gets to decide the winner. Each player takes turns to be the Big Weird Chief. Why not wear a crown when it's your turn?

 

 

 

You can play your weirdo card at any time and as often as you want to. So there are lots of opportunities to be weird. Think up your own answer and let your friends quiver at your total brilliance. 

Ten Weirdo Cards each with its unique name:

  • The Onlookers
  • The Starving Ram
  • The Buddha of Borrowed Time
  • The Fisherman's Rotting Teeth
  • The Wild Man of Abergavenny
  • The Waddling Pigs of Shenzhen
  • The Turbo Turtles
  • The Golden Monkey of Sapporo
  • The Wheels of Fortune
  • The Lunch of the Gluten-intolerant Maiden 

 

At the end of the game, count up the cards you've won and consult the Weird League Table to find out your Official Weirdo Rating. The Weird League Table will tell you if you are Ruler of the World or if you need help. 

 

 

 

 

 

 
So if you like chicken dancing, sleeping in a curtain, licking your TV screen, or even dating your dog, don't be ashamed! We all do weird things!

 

Being weird is empowering.
        Being weird is what makes us human.
                And above all, being weird is FUN!
 
Thank you for taking the time to look at our Indiegogo project. We would really appreciate you backing our new game and in return we will send you the first of our HOW AM I WEIRD boxes as fast as we possibly can! 
Thank you!
Peace and love!

story:
Welcome to this Indiegogo community-driven campaign to bring the iconic legacy teams to the brand new PVC material.

By supporting this Indiegogo project, you will receive the following:

  • The Fisherman's Guild: The Changing Tide in PVC
    • 6 Players, 1 Terrain Piece, 1 Goal, 1 Ball
  • The Fisherman's Guild: The Pirate's Return in PVC
    • 6 Players, 1 Terrain Piece, 1 Goal, 1 Ball
  • 12 Exclusive Alt. Art Cards - with unique artwork for the iconic Fisherman Captain Shark.

The Fisherman’s Guild: The Changing Tide

“Ain’t no other team who can catch ‘em. Until someone gets their game on, the Fishermen’s Guild will keep on winning.”

— Flint, Mason’s Guild

As a cunning predator, Shark is the kind of captain crowds love to watch and players hate to face because he’s aggressively fast. And he’s not shy about showing off. Circling the currents of the pitch, his plays aim to shame—he darts in, steals the ball, and sinks a shot in a flash of blue. Fading back into the murky shadows, he patiently waits to strike again.

Fast, agile, and fragile, his team’s playstyle is about outsmarting opponents with clever plays and swift goals. Led by one of the fastest captains, this team clinches the early game by sinking goals quickly. Coaches who want speed and a kick skill stronger than the surging tides will find this Fishermen team to be a perfect match.

The Fisherman’s Guild: Pirate’s Return

“I’ve heard all the rumours lad. Corsair’s a drunk – he’s not match fit! Appearances can be deceiving young blood – under his leadership we’re rebuilding, being shaped into his team again - ready for anything.”

— Greyscales, Fisherman’s Guild

Once the ambitious and charismatic skipper of his crew, Corsair was brought low by a brutal attack orchestrated by the Butcher’s Guild that sent him crashing out of the team. However cutthroat pirates like Corsair don’t fold sails easily – the exile has returned, desperate to reclaim his mantle

This Fisherman’s Guild side are slyer than other Fisherman teams in how they play their game; able to move enemy players around and cut away crucial opposition players. Their flexibility leaves them a dangerous footballing side, and coaches will love the tricks they can use to control the board. 

Exclusive Alt. Art Cards

For supporting this community-driven campaign, along with receiving this product early we are giving Indiegogo backers a set of Exclusive Alt. Art Cards only available during this campaign. The iconic Fisherman Captain Shark card also features brand new artwork as shown above.

Shipping will be charged after the Indiegogo finishes based on actual costs incurred to ship and is collected via our pledge manager system. This allows us to charge fairly for all backers and avoid a 'one size fits all' mentality to shipping.  

Estimated shipping rates are presented below - we have based these on our current set weights/sizes so we expect little deviation from these prices - however these are just estimates:

  • UNITED KINGDOM: $5
  • EUROPE: $10
  • USA: $15
  • REST OF WORLD: $20

Any pledges confirmed after our pledge manager deadline will be shipped from the UK hub at a later date and will likely incur increased shipping costs. 

Below is the general schedule once the Indiegogo ends so you know when to expect money to be taken and our overall shipping plan. Again these are estimates: 

You will be charged immediately when you pledge.​

Indiegogo Campaign Ends 

  • 1-2 Months – Pledge Manager sent to backers confirming address details and taking payment for shipping. Deadline of closing determined after this.
  • 1 Month Before Shipping – Any late confirmations after this deadline will be shipped from the UK after all other pledges are completed and may incur additional cost. 

We are unable to ship to PO Boxes.

We have an experienced background in delivering multiple crowd-funded projects - such as the original Guild Ball. 

We are fully aware of potential delays that may happen with products that are produced in China, the common ones being delays in production, shipping, and customs.

We have estimated the delivery for November 2018, but please understand this is only an estimate. Due to the global logistics involved in shipping, some regions may receive their pledges sooner than others.

We have prepared as much as possible with our production for a successful campaign; however, we will refund pledges if for some unforeseen reason the game cannot be delivered at all.

======= 
Refunds 
=======

Refunds may be given within 60 days of the campaign ending, including fees. After that time, refunds may be given minus the Indiegogo and payment processing fees, as we will not be able to claim those back after 60 days.

We are unable to issue refunds once we have begun the packaging and shipment stages of the project (around 6–8 weeks before the actual shipping date).

Refunds within 60 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit/debit card. Refunds after 60 days of the campaign ending are processed via PayPal only.

This is a USD Indiegogo, however, refunds will be processed in GBP for the amount received, excluding any applicable fees dependent on the day on which the refund is processed as detailed above.

================= 
Terms and Conditions 
=================

If you do not confirm your shipping and pledge details within 10 weeks of our notification via email to confirm them, your pledge will be treated as abandoned. We will, however, look at each case sympathetically and try our best to satisfy each customer.

By pledging on this Indiegogo you agree that our responsibility to you is for shipping your order as entered into the pledge management system. You are responsible for import or other duties that may be payable to relevant tax authorities. You also accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your pledge being unable to be delivered or lost in transit.

If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Indiegogo project.

If you have any questions regarding this campaign, please contact support@steamforged.com

For retailers, please see our post HERE addressing any concerns regarding this campaign.
story_txt:
Welcome to this Indiegogo community-driven campaign to bring the iconic legacy teams to the brand new PVC material.
By supporting this Indiegogo project, you will receive the following:

The Fisherman's Guild: The Changing Tide in PVC6 Players, 1 Terrain Piece, 1 Goal, 1 Ball

The Fisherman's Guild: The Pirate's Return in PVC6 Players, 1 Terrain Piece, 1 Goal, 1 Ball

12 Exclusive Alt. Art Cards - with unique artwork for the iconic Fisherman Captain Shark.



The Fisherman’s Guild: The Changing Tide
“Ain’t no other team who can catch ‘em. Until someone gets their game on, the Fishermen’s Guild will keep on winning.”
— Flint, Mason’s Guild
As a cunning predator, Shark is the kind of captain crowds love to watch and players hate to face because he’s aggressively fast. And he’s not shy about showing off. Circling the currents of the pitch, his plays aim to shame—he darts in, steals the ball, and sinks a shot in a flash of blue. Fading back into the murky shadows, he patiently waits to strike again.
Fast, agile, and fragile, his team’s playstyle is about outsmarting opponents with clever plays and swift goals. Led by one of the fastest captains, this team clinches the early game by sinking goals quickly. Coaches who want speed and a kick skill stronger than the surging tides will find this Fishermen team to be a perfect match.

The Fisherman’s Guild: Pirate’s Return
“I’ve heard all the rumours lad. Corsair’s a drunk – he’s not match fit! Appearances can be deceiving young blood – under his leadership we’re rebuilding, being shaped into his team again - ready for anything.”
— Greyscales, Fisherman’s Guild
Once the ambitious and charismatic skipper of his crew, Corsair was brought low by a brutal attack orchestrated by the Butcher’s Guild that sent him crashing out of the team. However cutthroat pirates like Corsair don’t fold sails easily – the exile has returned, desperate to reclaim his mantle
This Fisherman’s Guild side are slyer than other Fisherman teams in how they play their game; able to move enemy players around and cut away crucial opposition players. Their flexibility leaves them a dangerous footballing side, and coaches will love the tricks they can use to control the board. 

Exclusive Alt. Art Cards
For supporting this community-driven campaign, along with receiving this product early we are giving Indiegogo backers a set of Exclusive Alt. Art Cards only available during this campaign. The iconic Fisherman Captain Shark card also features brand new artwork as shown above.

You will be charged immediately when you pledge.​

story:
Help us save cats by supporting our card and dice game.  Just1MoreCat is an all ages card and dice game where the champion of the game saves the most cats. Players adopt cats from the cat herd, then trade, steal, and adopt more (you guessed it) cats. Watch out for cat fights and Catmaggedon! The ultimate goal of this game extends beyond the deck as we plan to donate funds from each sale to local animal shelters.  If we can get just one more cat adopted, we've made a difference!

 

We created our game to be fun and enjoyable by a wide range of players. Set up is easy and game play is fun and interactive. Players as young as 8 years old can enjoy our game as well as adults. A typical game of five rounds last about 45 minutes. Our game is suitable for 2-6 players.

 

Setting Up the Game

Shuffle both decks of cards and keep face down. Spread the Cat Cards all over the table to form a "cat herd". Place the Draw Cards in a stack next to the cat herd.

Playing the Game

To start, each player adopts 3 random cats from the cat herd and places them face down on the table in front of them. Players then roll a dice to determine who starts the round. The player with the highest roll goes first and draws a card from the top of the Draw Deck.

If a tan Leg Up Card is drawn, keep it hidden from the other players and place it face down on the table in front of you with your adopted cats. Use this card to gain an advantage during a cat fight. If a blue Transfer Card or a green Reveal Card is drawn, follow the written instructions on the card and discard it next to the Draw Deck face up. If a purple Cat Fight Card is drawn, follow the steps below for a Cat Fight.

When a turn has ended, the next player (clockwise) draws a card from the top of the Draw Deck. The round continues in this fashion until a red Nap Time Card is drawn.

Winning the Game

When a Nap Time Card is drawn the round is over. Players add up the points on their Cat Cards and the player with the most points wins that round. Record the score and set up the the next round. Keep any unused Leg Up Cards with you for the next round.

At the conclusion of five rounds of play, the player with the highest total points wins the game.

What is a Cat Fight?

When a player draws a Cat Fight Card, they have a chance to take a cat from another player. The player who drew the Cat Fight Card is the attacker and the other player is the defender during the cat fight.

Using Leg Up Cards

The attacker may choose first to play one of their Leg Up Cards to gain an advantage in the cat fight. If the attacker chooses to play a Leg Up Card, the defender may respond with one of their Leg Up Cards. Multiple Leg Up Cards may be played in this alternating fashion.

If the attacker chooses not to play any Leg Up Cards, the defender may respond with only one of their Leg Up Cards.

Once all the chosen Leg Up Cards have been played, the cat fight begins.

The Cat Fight

Each player rolls a die (or dice) and selects the single highest die they roll.

If the attacker's die is higher than the defender's die, they have won the cat fight and may take a cat from the defender. If the defender's die is higher than or equal to the attacker's die, they have successfully defended their cats from being taken.

Using Do Over Cards

A Do Over Card may be used now if you lost the cat fight. All played Leg Up Cards will remain in effect.

After the Cat Fight

Discard the Cat Fight Card and all used Leg up Cards next to the Draw Card pile face up.

 

Q1. How will you be donating funds to animal shelters? 

We will be donating a portion of our profits for each game sold.  

  • If we sell up to 100 games, we will donate $3 for each game sold. 
  • If we sell between 101 and 250 games, we will donate $4 for each game sold.
  • between 251 and 500 games, we will donate $5 for each game sold.
  • between 501 and 1000 games, we will donate $6 for each game sold.
  • greater than 1001, we will donate $7 for each game sold.

Funds will go to animal shelters in our local area to assist in covering adoption fees.

Q2. Do you know that a group of cats is actually referred to as a clowder?

Yep, but we think "herd" is funnier and more easily recognized by our younger players.

 

Our game development company, founded in 2015, is called QuitWork Games, LLC; our motto is "Quit Working and Start Playing".

We proved our ability to lead a successfully funded campaign with our first offering Government Worker the Card Game. We fulfilled all of our rewards on time and established an e-commerce business.

Each member of QuitWork Games, LLC has led many successful developmental projects. Our team has over 20 years of design and print production experience and over 28 years of bringing a variety of challenging projects to life. We have used our experience in research, mathematics, graphics design, and engineering to prototype, stylize, and optimize the gameplay.

We have found that card games are rather low risk ventures. Our game components are complete and ready for production. We have fully developed and game-tested the meow out of it. The game is ready to go, we simply need to know how many to order.

We have carefully sized and packaged our game to optimize efficiency, minimize lead time, and reduce production costs. We have down-selected to a printer that will deliver on-time quality products no matter how tall the order.

story:
Player Tools – mobile application for RPG, LARP, board & card games and a miniatures wargames. The app will be available for Android and iOS for free! Find us:

Project page        Facebook         Youtube         

First days special offer!

For individual

 

For companies

 

 

 

 

 

 

For 2500 $

 

We need capital to make the app graphics better. First of all, we want to improve map graphics - from 15 to nearly 50 colored elements. If we collect the necessary funds, in the second place we want to improve the menu graphics, character cards, tokens, bases and more.

 

 

We are from Poland.  We speak English, but it would be better to hire a professional translator - the application will not contain any mistakes, that you will probably find in our campaign.

More

Functions:

RPG characters cards:

  • Cards for most popular systems
  • A new card every week
  • Cards for the most popular systems
  • Your statistics always with you
  • Play wherever and and whenever you want
  • You never lost them
  • A tool to create your own cards
  • When you open the card, swipe your finger to the right to quickly jump to the dice or swipe to the left to quickly jump to the maps
  • In basic version 2 character card records (for each game!) - Premium account 5 - 10 (depending on card type)
  • Coming soon: equipment cards

Generators

  • Generators for RPG or LARP (useful for storytelling) allow you to increase the randomness of the game or inspire you to create a script.
  • Generators of characters, locations, animals, objects, events. Fantasy mode, realistic mode and sf mode.
  • We plan to develop generators continually by adding new ones. For example: generator of planets, occupation, shops, city, flag, army, rune, ritual, witchcraft, art, elixirs, cosmic, weapons, meals, weather, tournaments, traps, monsters, motifs, cave, monuments, traditions and more.

Maps:

  • A simple mapping tool for RPG games
  • If we reach the goal, it will allow us to build a map of 50 items. If we manage to collect $ 5,000, we will offer new mapping types: dungeon, town, building, etc - with other items for each.
  • 5 map records in the basic version – 15 in premium
  • Meantime, we planning to create unlimited number of map records for premium users

Dices:

  • Quick throw for the most common types of dices, or by typing the appropriate name (eg d74) - other types.
  • Including throwing multiple dices at once
  • Dice calculations programming (basic version - memorizing 5 formulas, premium - unlimited)

Minatures wargames tools

  • Tool for measuring the distance between figures, verifying the shot line (for games 2d), checking the range of the explosion, monitoring the angle between the targets.
  • Hold the phone over the board and check the distance between the figures, the line of fire, the area of the spell/garnet.

Tokens and counters

  • Universal tokens that make points counting easier.
  • Universal (useful in every game) and adapted to the most popular games, such as Munchkin, Catan, Magic The Gathering.
  • When you forget Your counters
  • When no space for place all boards
  • Store results

Randoms

  • Universal lottery like throwing coins or rock, paper, scissors against the computer.
  • Throwing a coin, rock, paper, scissors against the computer.
  • Just in case, if you did not carry coins or hand

Music for games

  • Climatic game music, movie music, game background sounds (eg inn interior, harbor, space station) and single sounds (eg, fire, shoots, water noise).
  • Some options may require internet connection
  • The selected tracks for specific games
  • Quick access to the dwarven song, folk music, celtic music, film music and all the sounds that will be needed during the session

LARP combat simulator

  • Battle simulator is based on random method and character statistics analysis.
  • Enter characters statistic, and the application will calculate and it will show the course of the whole fight that can be played.
  • If we will raise the sum of $ 2,500, we will indicate each blow with a picture :)

Base larp scenarios                         

  • Big base larp scenarios – requires Internet connection.
  • You can be inspired by  scenarios, modify their own way and share your creations
  • Base tips for LARP - instructions for building weapons, advice on playing, etc.

Dictionaries

  • Large base of names, weapons and locations, which helps you to create Your character.
  • Elvish names, celtic names, blades, bows, aircrafts, tanks and more

Scenario Maker

  • Make your own scenario – use generators, dices and maps! It’s really easy with this app
  • Select screen (note, map, dice or generator), personalize it and select the next screen
  • Save  2 scenarios in free version - unlimited saves in premium version 

Print & Play base

  • Large base of Print & Play games and authority systems – requires Internet connection.
  • When you get bored with Your titles and run out of money for new one
  • Discover new independent artists

Base for players

  • Base shops, internet shops, portals, blogs, gaming clubs, pubs for players, conventions, and other locations important for the players . – requires Internet connection.
  • The database will be updated weekly

News Feed

  • News Feed from the best gaming portals.

 

Rewards

Individual

1 $ - Good Spirit - special thanks via mail

2 $ - Helpful Ghost - special thanks in FB + Good Spirit

3 $ - Golden Heart - special thanks in appliation + Helpful Ghost

4 $ - Beginning Player – premium account for 3 months and ebook about making the app + Helpful Ghost

 

More about Premium at the end of page - Q&A section

 

5 $ - Player – Lifetime Gratitude Certyficate (PDF) + Beginning Player

6 $ - Adict – Premium Account for 6 months and access to FB group + Player

9$ - Warrior - Premium Account for  1 year  + Adict

12 $ - I dont play but i want to help – Real Vennatais’ nobility title

15 $ - Hunter – lifetime premium account + Adict

20 $ - Wizard – Lifetime alpha acces + Hunter

30 $ - I am the dice – Your character in RPG card and:

  •  access to close FB group
  • Lifetime Gratitude Certificate (PDF)
  • ebook about creating app
  • special thanks via mail and on FB

(not premium account!)

35 $ - I live in board game package - Startup package for each of our games + Wizard

42 $ - I wear only card protectors - I am the dice + I live in board game package

52 $ - I take everything - I wear only card protectors + I dont play but i want to help

65 $ - Just make it - The very special thanks in app + I take everything

Companies

5 $ - Help - 3 months of promotion in the base :

  • Promotion in search results for your store, portal, blog, publications, pubs for players
  • Your company in the "recommended" category on the main page of the database (the application randomly selects 10 companies)
  • Your company on top of search results

*Only companies related to games

10 $ - Cooperation -  6 months of promotion

15 $ - Synergy - 1 year of promotion

30 $ - Partner - Your logo, web address and information about company in the section „about application" + Synergy

50 $ - Curator - Your logo, web address and information about company in the section „about application" + Partner

750 $ - Sponsor - Your company logo (with a link to the website) in the collective start screen + Curator

1500 $ - Patron - Your company logo (with a link to the website) in the full start screen + Curator

 

Cooperation with portals

•If you have a portal, page, FB group about board games, card games, wargames, convention, RPG or LARP, and want to help us inform your readers about our initiative

•If you need more information or materials, please contact us: contact@graprgp.pl

•If you mention about us on your website, let us know - we will repay you by promoting you in the database or on FB.

I want to help but I have no money

•Like us on FB! - Random 5% of people who like us receive a premium account for a month

•Share our posts with a link to the action - a random 5% of people will receive two months of premium account

•Tag your friends under the posts with a link to the action - a random 5% of those who tag at least 10 friends will receive two months premium

•Follow fanpage and take part in partners’ competitions

•And if you do not expect anything in return - tell about us to all and comment our posts

Premium account

Premium account costs 2$ monthly. You can purchase lifetime premium account only by this crowdfunding action. Profits:

  • more RPG Characters cards saves (5 or 10 instead 2 - for each game)
  • more map saves (15 instead 5)
  • unlimited dice formula saves
  • more music & sounds - premium tracks, playlist, etc.
  • unlimited scenario saves 
  • more scenario elements
  • more tokens and counters
  • no advertising
  • change app skins
  • vote for next RPG characters card
  • more profits soon
  • by purchasing the premium account You support us and help to develop the app!

Risks and challenges

The app will enter Beta for Android in June 2017 and iOS July 2017. We will delivery all rewards in this time. We are a normal, legal company. In May/June we will issue an invoice – so you can be sure – you will obtain your rewards. We have done a bigger part of app and we need Your support for better graphic and translation. It is known that there may be various problems  but we will release this application after all - the only risk is to receive it  later or with presented graphic and translation.

My character in RPG card – what is it?

Every new user will obtain application with written out RPG characters cards – one of them can obtain your characters’ description. You can choose a game, but remember – first come first served. After purchasing this option, write us which game you choose.

The user can reset and fill it himself.

What is section „about app”?

In this section you can find all credits, contact us and get information about our supporters  (usual users who supported us with 3 $ and companies which supported us with 30 $) You can find also link to internet page and description about each of that companies.

Who are You?

We are company from Poland - generally, we sell programs for hospitals, schools and companies. We are going to produce applications for mobile devices, but we need Your support. By helping us produce this app, you are helping us produce all the next app and games.

5 map records in the basic version – 15 in premium
Meantime, we planning to create unlimited number of map records for premium users
Dices:
Quick throw for the most common types of dices, or by typing the appropriate name (eg d74) - other types.
Including throwing multiple dices at once
Dice calculations programming (basic version - memorizing 5 formulas, premium - unlimited)
Minatures wargames tools
Tool for measuring the distance between figures, verifying the shot line (for games 2d), checking the range of the explosion, monitoring the angle between the targets.
Hold the phone over the board and check the distance between the figures, the line of fire, the area of the spell/garnet.
Tokens and counters
Universal tokens that make points counting easier.
Universal (useful in every game) and adapted to the most popular games, such as Munchkin, Catan, Magic The Gathering.
When you forget Your counters
When no space for place all boards
Store results
Randoms
Universal lottery like throwing coins or rock, paper, scissors against the computer.
Throwing a coin, rock, paper, scissors against the computer.
Just in case, if you did not carry coins or hand
Music for games
Climatic game music, movie music, game background sounds (eg inn interior, harbor, space station) and single sounds (eg, fire, shoots, water noise).
Some options may require internet connection
The selected tracks for specific games
Quick access to the dwarven song, folk music, celtic music, film music and all the sounds that will be needed during the session
LARP combat simulator
Battle simulator is based on random method and character statistics analysis.
Enter characters statistic, and the application will calculate and it will show the course of the whole fight that can be played.
If we will raise the sum of $ 2,500, we will indicate each blow with a picture :)
Base larp scenarios                         
Big base larp scenarios – requires Internet connection.
You can be inspired by  scenarios, modify their own way and share your creations
Base tips for LARP - instructions for building weapons, advice on playing, etc.
Dictionaries
Large base of names, weapons and locations, which helps you to create Your character.
Elvish names, celtic names, blades, bows, aircrafts, tanks and more
Scenario Maker
Make your own scenario – use generators, dices and maps! It’s really easy with this app
Select screen (note, map, dice or generator), personalize it and select the next screen
Save  2 scenarios in free version - unlimited saves in premium version 
Print & Play base
Large base of Print & Play games and authority systems – requires Internet connection.
When you get bored with Your titles and run out of money for new one
Discover new independent artists
Base for players
Base shops, internet shops, portals, blogs, gaming clubs, pubs for players, conventions, and other locations important for the players . – requires Internet connection.
The database will be updated weekly
News FeedNews Feed from the best gaming portals. RewardsIndividual1 $ - Good Spirit - special thanks via mail2 $ - Helpful Ghost - special thanks in FB + Good Spirit3 $ - Golden Heart - special thanks in appliation + Helpful Ghost4 $ - Beginning Player – premium account for 3 months and ebook about making the app + Helpful Ghost  More about Premium at the end of page - Q&A section 5 $ - Player – Lifetime Gratitude Certyficate (PDF) + Beginning Player 6 $ - Adict – Premium Account for 6 months and access to FB group + Player 9$ - Warrior - Premium Account for  1 year  + Adict12 $ - I dont play but i want to help – Real Vennatais’ nobility title 15 $ - Hunter – lifetime premium account + Adict20 $ - Wizard – Lifetime alpha acces + Hunter30 $ - I am the dice – Your character in RPG card and:
 access to close FB group
Lifetime Gratitude Certificate (PDF)
ebook about creating app
special thanks via mail and on FB
(not premium account!)35 $ - I live in board game package - Startup package for each of our games + Wizard 42 $ - I wear only card protectors - I am the dice + I live in board game package52 $ - I take everything - I wear only card protectors + I dont play but i want to help65 $ - Just make it - The very special thanks in app + I take everythingCompanies
5 $ - Help - 3 months of promotion in the base :
Promotion in search results for your store, portal, blog, publications, pubs for players
Your company in the "recommended" category on the main page of the database (the application randomly selects 10 companies)
Your company on top of search results
*Only companies related to games10 $ - Cooperation -  6 months of promotion15 $ - Synergy - 1 year of promotion30 $ - Partner - Your logo, web address and information about company in the section „about application" + Synergy50 $ - Curator - Your logo, web address and information about company in the section „about application" + Partner750 $ - Sponsor - Your company logo (with a link to the website) in the collective start screen + Curator1500 $ - Patron - Your company logo (with a link to the website) in the full start screen + Curator Cooperation with portals•If you have a portal, page, FB group about board games, card games, wargames, convention, RPG or LARP, and want to help us inform your readers about our initiative•If you need more information or materials, please contact us: contact@graprgp.pl•If you mention about us on your website, let us know - we will repay you by promoting you in the database or on FB.I want to help but I have no money•Like us on FB! - Random 5% of people who like us receive a premium account for a month•Share our posts with a link to the action - a random 5% of people will receive two months of premium account•Tag your friends under the posts with a link to the action - a random 5% of those who tag at least 10 friends will receive two months premium•Follow fanpage and take part in partners’ competitions•And if you do not expect anything in return - tell about us to all and comment our postsPremium accountPremium account costs 2$ monthly. You can purchase lifetime premium account only by this crowdfunding action. Profits:
more RPG Characters cards saves (5 or 10 instead 2 - for each game)
more map saves (15 instead 5)
unlimited dice formula saves
more music & sounds - premium tracks, playlist, etc.
unlimited scenario saves 
more scenario elements
more tokens and counters
no advertising
change app skins
vote for next RPG characters card
more profits soon
by purchasing the premium account You support us and help to develop the app!
Risks and challengesThe app will enter Beta for Android in June 2017 and iOS July 2017. We will delivery all rewards in this time. We are a normal, legal company. In May/June we will issue an invoice – so you can be sure – you will obtain your rewards. We have done a bigger part of app and we need Your support for better graphic and translation. It is known that there may be various problems  but we will release this application after all - the only risk is to receive it  later or with presented graphic and translation.My character in RPG card – what is it?Every new user will obtain application with written out RPG characters cards – one of them can obtain your characters’ description. You can choose a game, but remember – first come first served. After purchasing this option, write us which game you choose.The user can reset and fill it himself.What is section „about app”?In this section you can find all credits, contact us and get information about our supporters  (usual users who supported us with 3 $ and companies which supported us with 30 $) You can find also link to internet page and description about each of that companies.Who are You?We are company from Poland - generally, we sell programs for hospitals, schools and companies. We are going to produce applications for mobile devices, but we need Your support. By helping us produce this app, you are helping us produce all the next app and games.

story:
About

The old ones won’t suffer competing cults

The objective of the game: Protect your minions, while taking out the enemy’s minions. You will use your influence to make sure that the Old Ones recognize you as their true harbingers.

From Netherpetal Gaming

     Dreadmoor is a 2-4 person game of dueling cult leaders attempting to rid the world of their opposing cults.
     The objective of the game is to kill off the opposing player(s) by killing their minions. You achieve this goal by using your influence cards to slay, steal, and recruit minions to serve the Old Ones.

How to play

https://youtu.be/tPqCIcis_J8

Rules
https://www.netherpetalgaming.com/s/Dreadmoor.pdf

Website

www.netherpetalgaming.com

Stretch goal:

150% funded: Expansion: To serve the Old Gods

Risks and challenges

Art for the game is still a work in progress, and the prints can be ordered when this is finished. Prints will come in a custom rigid box and shrink wrapped.

story:
Dice Bottles is Relaunching!

We've been working away in the background preparing to relaunch our products since our success on Kickstarter.  I was nearly ready to relaunch when Covid-19 became a reality in the United States.  I realized I could help by doing a donation drive with my relaunch and raise funds founds for charities providing medical supplies and support in response to Covid-19. 

All profits from this campaign will be donated. 

In the process of resupplying for my relaunch I have a stock of factory second starter vials that I'm offering through this campaign. They have a more rustic appearance with scratches, small chips, and other imperfections.  Those not wanting factory seconds will be able to purchase through my normal store when it's open. 

ALL profits from this campaign will be evenly split between these three charities:

  • Direct Relief - https://www.directrelief.org/
  • Project C.U.R.E - https://projectcure.org/
  • Extra Life - Benefiting Dell Children's Medical Center of Central Texas 

 

Dice Bottles Starter Kit Vials

The Starter Vials are a single vial containing 10 d4 blood red dice with gold lettering and an ornate label with the formulas for all the health potions in Dungeons and Dragons 5th edition.  Bring the game to life by having such a realistic prop for your table to use! 

This campaign will be using factory seconds and you should expect small blemishes. You will be able to find unblemished versions in our store when it launches (soon!). 

You will receive it as a kit (label and dice). 

 

The Clerics need our help! 

It is with great sadness that I bring to your attention a realm mirroring our own that is in dire need of the heroic efforts of pauper and duke alike. In this strange realm my magical skills and talents were unusable, and a plague like none I had seen before was ravaging their kingdoms. They have a magic of their own, but the plague was laying claim to more victims and surpassing the constitutions of the realm's considerable army of clerics. They wore a curious armour into battle with the fiend, and it was with horror that I learned why: the plague was invisible to all, and no spell would uncover it. They were forced to fight this invisible villain knowing that if it landed the smallest of blows against them they themselves would be subject to it’s devious curses. Their armor smiths were overtaxed as any armour that was even touched by the enemy became it’s weapon, and would require all armour to be destroyed if any of it were thought to have been cursed. I watched as their wise and fragile were taken, and I am moved to compassion and action on their behalf.

 

I am coming to you with an opportunity to help. I have found that we can direct our charges of energy into the aether and with that I am able to convert that to their coinage. They have guilds that will be able to use those funds to provide for their clerics and others suffering from the effects of this plague. In return for your magics and energy I will be providing one of my excellent potions. I only need help covering my delivery costs, as my mule gets quite hungry while I go about delivering the potions.

 

What We Need & What You Get

$5,000 is the minimum to make this donation drive have at least 50% of the funds go directly to charity. You will each get one of Dice Bottles starter vials in return.  

I have 500 starter kits that I can assemble and mail out immediately after funding has concluded. These are designated as the priority starter vials. I have another 1,500 starter vials which need me to order from US vendors, and will ship out as soon as we have all the pieces needed.

Transparency has always been key to me and even more with a charity drive, so I will break down all the expenditures as best as I can.  

Ranges represent costs depending on number of starter vials sold

  • Dice - $0 - I'm donating up to 20,000 dice as part of this. 
  • Shipping supplies - Between $100 - $770
  • Vial labels - $10-342 
  • Legal notices - $10-$79
  • 5% Indigogo platform fee
  • 2.9% + ($0.30 per transaction) Credit card processing fees
  • Accounting - $2,000 - I need to reserve enough to pay an accountant to properly handle my taxes for this drive. 

The Impact

With your contribution you will get one of Dice Bottles excellent healing potions and you get to help out three charities that are helping the doctors and medical professionals on the front line!  You'll also help get the word out that Dice Bottles is returning and enable us to bringing our products back to market!

ALL profits from this campaign will be evenly split between these three charities:

  • Direct Relief - https://www.directrelief.org/
  • Project C.U.R.E - https://projectcure.org/
  • Extra Life - Benefiting Dell Children's Medical Center of Central Texas 

Risks & Challenges

The Risks:

  • Shipping will be via United States Postal Service.  I don't expect problems, but Covid-19 could have a real impact on delivery. I will keep you as informed as possible about any shipping problems I face. 
  • For the 1500 non-priority vials, there is a risk that Uline (my shipping materials supplier) or one of my other US vendors isn't able to deliver labels or the legal disclaimer papers on schedule. I don't anticipate there being issues, as none of my vendors has mentioned any problems yet, but even if they do it should just be a delay. I will keep you well informed of any delays as soon as possible. 
  • I, or someone I might have to care for, could get sick from Covid-19. I've been doing everything I know how to do to keep myself, my son, and those close to me safe. I don't want to risk getting sick and I'm taking this pandemic seriously.  

The Challenges:

  • I am still a single dad, and still a one man shop. I also have a 9-5 style job and now have a young son doing distance learning at home.  I have redesigned the workload and manufacturing processes so I can manage the volumn of this campaign.  This isn't the first time I've shipped products and keeping this to one style of product will allow me to do the assembly in batches quickly. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to afford it right now, that's very understandable! You can still help by spreading a link to the campaign around, following us and sharing on social media (Facebook,  Twitter, and Instagram), or donating directly to the charities above! Every bit helps!

I will keep you well informed of any delays as soon as possible.

story:
You are cordially invited to attend the first annual KeithCon!
Friday March 6, 2020 at 6 PM – Sunday March 8, 2020 at 10 AM

We will be renting out a house in the old Dundee neighborhood of Omaha for an entire weekend of Table Top & Board Gaming, CCGing, RPG gaming, LARPing, and general nerdy fun. This event is limited to those aged 21 and older because alcohol will be present.

KeithCon is only a few weeks away, and I would love to see you there.  I have added some donation selections as well as being able to purchase a KeithCon T-shirt.  

KeithCon T-Shirt

story:
Disclaimer: None of the artwork on this page will be used in the game. This artwork was used with the creators permission!

 

Summary

Hi! My name is Kendall and soon I will graduate college with a Bachelors degree in Art and a Minor in Game Design. I have been assigned with the task of creating a tabletop game that will be made into a physical game in the spring! The game will be a card game where musclebound men from different time periods compete in a bodybuilding competition. 

I'm raising money to commission the artist Icemanblue to do the artwork for the game.

 

Game Story:

Hi! It’s me! NiceNasty! And I’m back with my great old pal Uncledaddy. So I won’t waste any time with todays wacky adventure. The other day I was reading some Muscle and Fitness Magazines and I said to myself, “Why don’t we have a bodybuilding contest of our very own?”.  Then I thought “It would be unorthodox to go around kidnapping random bodybuilders”, so I’ve built this time machine so we can go back in time to *ahem* “recruit” some beefy Barbarians, Spartans, Tribesmen, Greek Warriors you name it! Are you ready!

 

The Game

 

What comes with the game?

 

Cards:

Player Cards: Cards featuring the character with their stats and bio.

Posing Cards: Cards that display poses, used during main rounds to rack up points.

Power Ups: Cards that could give the hunk a boost. These cards can be earned from getting a full ego meter or bought with currency earned from the main rounds during rest periods.

Relationship Cards: Cards that are drawn to help you build a relationship with your hunk. These cards cost currency earned from the main rounds and can be bought during rest periods.

Event Cards: Cards that are drawn during rest periods. These events can heavily alter the competition or even lead to the death of one or more players.

Wrestling Cards: Cards that are used during Wrestling Battles.

Gameplay:

The game will be for 2-4 players. Each player gets to select their beefcake. Each beefcake has their own bio and stats.

Rounds:

All participating men are on stage.  Each player draws 4 posing cards. Each card has a number assigned to it for how effective it is. In each phase all participating players will pick a card and place it facedown. When all players have placed down their cards they will each reveal them. The highest scoring player wins. Depending on the events of each phase and the stats of each character, points can be added or deducted from their pose. There are 10 phases in a round and 5 rounds altogether.

 

Testosterone System:

If a hunk gets the lowest points in 2 posing phases consecutively, their testosterone meter will rise. Their testosterone meter will keep rising until this combo is broken. If the testosterone meter gets full, then that hunk must battle a hunk of his choice activating a wrestling game. After the wrestling game, the testosterone meter will go back to empty.

Ego System:

If a hunk gets the highest points in 2 posing phases consecutively, their ego meter will rise. Their ego meter will keep rising until this combo is broken. The higher their ego meter, the more bonus points they will get on each pose. If the ego meter gets full, the hunk gets a free solo pose, then the meter goes back to empty.

 

Relationship System:

When you build a relationship with your hunk, your relationship meter will rise depending on the event depicted on the card. Be aware that the higher the relationship meter is for your hunk, the more points will be deducted from his posing routine, seeing as he is not fully focused on the competition. He can, however, come to your aid and rescue during events depending on how high his relationship meter is.

Wrestling System:

When a wrestling game starts, each participating player must draw 4 wrestling cards. The wrestling cards display a wrestling move and how powerful it is. Players will place their cards facedown and turn them around to reveal their move. The hunks stats will alter how effective to move is. Whoever wins the most phases wins the wrestling match and the loser must sit out for the next phase.

Health System:

A hunk can take damage during a wrestling game or during an event. If a hunk loses all of their health, they must sit out for a whole round. Hunks can heal themselves through Power ups, events, and relationship cards

Rest Period:

Rest periods take place between rounds so there are 3 in total. Each player can use their currency to buy power ups and relationship cards. After everyone has bought their cards, each player must draw an event card and watch the events unfold.

The hunk with the most points at the end of round 5 wins the prize.

 

What We Need & What You Get

If I recieve 2000$, 1800$ will go to commissioning Icemanblue to creating the characters, card artwork and cover art for the game. The other 200$ will go toward putting the game together through https://www.thegamecrafter.com/.

What will come of this?

When the game is made on gamecrafter, it will be freely available for everyone to purchase.

What do you get out of helping me?

As you may know, Icemanblue is a phenomenal artist with loads of erotic images and stories under his belt. Unfortunately I was not allowed to get X-Rated with this game. If this game does well enough I would love to make a more NSFW expansions along with more games, partnered with Icemanblue's amazing artwork.

Risks & Challenges

The game will be made regardless of if I reach this goal or not. There should be no challenges

Other Ways You Can Help

Share some of your idea's with me!!! They are always welcome.

Relationship System:

When you build a relationship with your hunk, your relationship meter will rise depending on the event depicted on the card. Be aware that the higher the relationship meter is for your hunk, the more points will be deducted from his posing routine, seeing as he is not fully focused on the competition. He can, however, come to your aid and rescue during events depending on how high his relationship meter is.
Wrestling System:

When a wrestling game starts, each participating player must draw 4 wrestling cards. The wrestling cards display a wrestling move and how powerful it is. Players will place their cards facedown and turn them around to reveal their move. The hunks stats will alter how effective to move is. Whoever wins the most phases wins the wrestling match and the loser must sit out for the next phase.
Health System:

A hunk can take damage during a wrestling game or during an event. If a hunk loses all of their health, they must sit out for a whole round. Hunks can heal themselves through Power ups, events, and relationship cards
Rest Period:

Rest periods take place between rounds so there are 3 in total. Each player can use their currency to buy power ups and relationship cards. After everyone has bought their cards, each player must draw an event card and watch the events unfold.
The hunk with the most points at the end of round 5 wins the prize.
 

What We Need & What You Get
If I recieve 2000$, 1800$ will go to commissioning Icemanblue to creating the characters, card artwork and cover art for the game. The other 200$ will go toward putting the game together through https://www.thegamecrafter.com/.

What will come of this?
When the game is made on gamecrafter, it will be freely available for everyone to purchase.
What do you get out of helping me?

As you may know, Icemanblue is a phenomenal artist with loads of erotic images and stories under his belt. Unfortunately I was not allowed to get X-Rated with this game. If this game does well enough I would love to make a more NSFW expansions along with more games, partnered with Icemanblue's amazing artwork.

Risks & Challenges
The game will be made regardless of if I reach this goal or not. There should be no challenges

Other Ways You Can Help
Share some of your idea's with me!!! They are always welcome.

story:
About Me

I am an engineering graduate with graphics designing experience and this is my approach to revive the old games which are lost in this modern and digital time.  

What We Need & What You Get

As all of you is going be a part of this epic journey, you all have the right to know where all this money is going to be used, so here is a pie chart demonstrating the expenses - 

 

 

$10 - credit on the game board.

$25 - Whole game + credit on the gameboard.

$45 - Whole game + original game of 'Asta Changa' (which includes game board, 4x4 player tokens, 4+1 clamshells, rule book) + credit on the gameboard.

$65 - Whole game+ Exclusive game for the 2-8 players(which  includes 8 player gameboard, 2x8 player tokens, 8x8 house tokens, 5x30 money tokens, 40 property cards & 12 chance cards)  + original game of 'Asta Changa' (which includes game board, 4x4 player tokens, 4+1 clamshells, rule book) + credit on the gameboard.

 

The Early Prototypes

These are some images of the early prototype of the game :

 

 

Delivery And Shipping

  • The delivery of the game starts in September 2019.
  • Shipping charge may be applicable outside India.

Things You Should Know

No there is nothing to be afraid I am just going to tell you this that some changes may occur in the game board, tokens or packaging.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can make a great impact in this campaign not only in one way but in many other ways as well, like:

  • You can help me by suggesting any changes.
  • You can also submit some graphics for the project.
  • You get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you and have a great day.

story: ...

In Brief:

I'm a writer, game designer, and longtime fan of tabletop gaming. Train to Hell draws on a scenario I originally devised as a Halloween-themed tabletop RPG adventure, redesigned as a self-contained experience; a fun board game that won't take hours to learn, or set up, or to play, with clear goals and stakes set by a theme of supernatural peril, without leaning too hard into an atmosphere of fear or horror.

It's not enough for a board game's rules to be fun; to help players engage, artwork is hugely important - but it's not my forte. Train to Hell needs an artist!

We've all heard horror stories about people expecting art for free, in exchange for "exposure". Artists are workers; art is work. Train to Hell will pay its artist, but I'm not a monied patron of the arts - everyone benefits if I don't have to save up for years to do it!

What We Need & What You Get

Every single penny raised will go directly to commission game art.

I'm asking for £1000. After service and payment processing fees, that works out as the bare minimum art budget to commission all the game components. If I raise more, then I can commission more and better art! If I raise less, finishing the game will be significantly delayed, as I commission the work a piece at a time, out of my own pocket, as and when I can afford to.

I'm still evaluating what the purchase price of the finished game will be, and how best to arrange backer rewards. The goal is to discount the price of the finished article for all backers, ideally up to 100% off for sufficiently generous contributions, but several other things need to be finalised before I'll know exactly how that will work.

(If you have suggestions about backer rewards and how you'd like them to work, please do get in touch!)

The Impact

Without funding, it may take several years for me to commission a sufficient quantity of art. With funding, not only can I make the project happen sooner, but I can immediately start giving paid work to a freelance artist!

Risks & Challenges

This is my first physical board game. As crowdfunding backers are now well aware, many projects stumble on the unexpected complexity, cost and sheer length of time it takes to manufacture physical items. Print-on-demand technology has removed many of these risks for producing books, and is increasingly available to other niche industries - including board games. I have identified a POD game manufacturer, and am evaluating Train to Hell's design in light of their catalogue of standard game components and costs.

Contracting work to freelancers raises the prospect of delays, miscommunication and dissatisfaction. The artist I have in mind for Train to Hell has a portfolio of previous work for hire, and I have commissioned work from them before, for other projects, on which we've had an excellent working relationship.

Other Ways You Can Help

As with any crowdfunding campaign: give what you can, if you can; and whether or not you can give, spread the word!
